src: Tetëmbëdhjetë për qind e venezuelasve janë pa punë dhe pjesa më e madhe e atyre që janë në punë punojnë në ekonominë informale. Dy të tretat e venezuelianëve janë të punësuar në sektorin e shërbimeve, ndërsa rreth një e katërta në industri dhe një e pesta në sektorin e bujqësisë. Nafta është industri me rëndësi për venezuelasit, pasi vendi është një eksportues neto i saj, ndonëse vetëm një për qind punon në industrinë e naftës.
mt: 18% of Venezuelans are unemployed and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two-thirds of Venezuelans are employed in the service sector, while one-fourth are in industry and one-fifth in agriculture. Oil is an important industry for Venezuelans, as the country is a net exporter of it, although only one percent work in the oil industry.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: Yjet lëshojnë dritë dhe nxehtësi për arsye të energjisë që prodhohet kur atomet e hidrogjenit kombinohen (ose bashkohen) bashkë për formimin e elementeve më të rënda. Shkencëtarët po punojnë për krijimin e një reaktori i cili mund të prodhojë energji në të njëjtën mënyrë. Sidoqoftë, ky është një problem që zgjidhet me shumë vështirësi dhe do të nevojiten shumë vite para se të shohim të ndërtohen reaktorë të dobishëm me fuzion.
mt: Stars emit light and heat for the energy that is produced when hydrogen atoms combine (or join) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working on creating a reactor that can produce energy in the same way. However, this is a problem that is solved with difficulty and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: Përbërësit dhe elementet mund të kalojnë nga njëra gjendje në tjetrën dhe të mos pësojnë ndryshime. Azoti si gaz ka përsëri të njëjtat veti si azoti i lëngshëm. Gjendja e lëngshme ka një dendësi më të madhe, por molekulat janë përsëri të njëjtat. Një shembull tjetër është uji. Uji si komponim përbëhet nga dy atome hidrogjen dhe një atom oksigjen. Ai ka po atë strukturë molekulare, pavarësisht nëse është gaz, lëng apo lëndë e ngurtë. Ndonëse gjendja e tij fizike mund të ndryshojë, gjendja e tij kimike mbetet po ajo.
mt: Components and elements can pass from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas has again the same properties as solid nitrogen. The liquid state has a higher density, but the molecules are again the same. Another example is water. Water as a compound is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure, regardless of whether it is a gas, liquid or solid. Although its physical state can change, its chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: Gjatë Luftës Amerikane për Pavarësi, trembëdhjetë kolonitë krijuan së pari një qeveri qendrore të dobët - me Kongresin si strukturën e saj të vetme - sipas neneve të Konfederatës. Kongresi nuk kishte asnjë fuqi të vendoste taksa dhe, duke qenë se nuk kishte një pushtet ekzekutiv kombëtar ose pushtet gjyqësor, ai u mbështet tek autoritetet shtetërore, të cilat shpesh nuk ishin bashkëpunuese, për zbatimin e të gjithë ligjeve të tij. Gjithashtu, ai nuk kishte kompetenca të shkelte ligjet për tatimet dhe tarifat mes shteteve. Nenet kërkonin miratimin e njëzëshëm nga të gjitha shtetet para se të mund të ndryshoheshin dhe aq pak seriozisht e morën shtetet qeverinë qendrore, saqë përfaqësuesit e tyre shpesh mungonin.
mt: During the American Revolutionary War, the thirteen colonies first created a weak central government - with Congress as its only structure - under the Articles of Confederation. Congress had no power to levy taxes and, lacking a national executive or judicial power, it relied on state authorities, which were often uncooperative, to enforce all of its laws. It also lacked the authority to override state laws on taxes and tariffs. The Articles required unanimous approval from all states before they could be changed and so little seriously took the central government that representatives often failed to show up.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: "Nëse e keni parë filmin ""Thesari Kombëtar"", mund të mendoni se prapa Deklaratës së Pavarësisë ka qenë e shkruar një hartë thesari. Megjithatë, kjo nuk është e vërtetë. Megjithëse ekziston diçka e shkruar prapa dokumentit, ajo nuk është hartë thesari. Prapa Deklaratës së Pavarësisë ishte shkruar ""Deklarata origjinale e Pavarësisë, e datës 4 korrik 1776"". Teksti shfaqet në fund të këtij dokumenti, i shkruar përmbys. Ndërkohë që askush s'e di me siguri se kush e shkroi, dihet që në fillim të ekzistencës së tij, dokumenti i madh i pergamenës (me përmasa 29¾ inç me 24½ inç) u mblodh si rul për ta ruajtur. Për këtë arsye, ka mundësi që shënimi të jetë vënë vetëm si etiketë."
mt: "If you have seen the movie "National Treasure," you may think that behind the Declaration of Independence was written a treasure map. However, this is not true. Although there is something written behind the document, it is not a treasure map. Behind the Declaration of Independence was written "Original Declaration of Independence, July 4, 1776." The text appears at the end of this document, written upside down. While no one knows for sure who wrote it, it is known that in the beginning of its existence, the large parchment (with dimensions of 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was gathered as a roll to preserve it. For this reason, it is possible that the note was only put as a label."
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Në fillim të pavarësisë së shtetit, shqyrtimi i Kopshteve Botanike të Singaporit nga ekspertët ndihmoi për ta transformuar ishullin në një qytet me kopsht tropikal. Një orkide hibride, Vanda Miss Joaquim, u zgjodh në vitin 1981 si lulja kombëtare e shtetit.
mt: At the start of the country's independence, the review of Singapore Botanic Gardens by experts helped to transform the island into a city with a tropical garden. A hybrid orchid, Vanda Miss Joaquim, was chosen in 1981 as the national flower of the country.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Ndonëse ndërtimi i piramidave me gurë vijoi deri në fund të Mbretërisë së Vjetër, madhësia dhe përsosmëria teknike e ndërtimit të piramidave të Gizës nuk u tejkalua asnjëherë. Egjiptianët e lashtë të Mbretërisë së Re u mrekulluan nga monumentet e të parëve të tyre që ishin në atë kohë shumë më të vjetra se një mijë vjet.
mt: Although the construction of pyramids continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the size and technical perfection of the construction of the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed. The ancient Egyptians of the New Kingdom were amazed by the monuments of their predecessors, which were at that time much older than a thousand years.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Çdo vit rreth tetorit, afërsisht 1,5 milionë barngrënës udhëtojnë në drejtim të rrafshinave të jugut, duke kapërcyer lumin Mara, nga kodrat veriore për shirat. Dhe më pas kthehen përsëri në veri duke kaluar nga perëndimi, duke kapërcyer edhe një herë lumin Mara pas shirave rreth muajit prill. Rajoni i Serengetit përmban Parkun Kombëtar të Serengetit, Zonën e Mbrojtjes së Ngorongoros dhe Rezervatin e Kafshëve të Masuas në Tanzani dhe Rezervatin Kombëtar Masai Mara në Kenia.
mt: 1.5 million wildebeest migrate south across the Mara River from the northern hills every October, and then back again in April, crossing the Mara River again. The Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area, and Masai Mara National Reserve are in Tanzania and Kenya, respectively.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: "Pasi mbaroi betejën për Francën, Gjermania nisi të përgatitej për të pushtuar ishullin e Britanisë. Gjermania e emërtoi sulmin me kodin ""Operacioni Luani i Detit"". Pjesa më e madhe e furnizimeve dhe armëve të rënda të ushtrisë britanike kishte humbur gjatë evakuimit të saj nga Dunkirku dhe për këtë arsye, ushtria ishte shumë e dobët. Megjithatë Marina Mbretërore ishte ende shumë më e fortë se Marina Gjermane (""Kriegsmarine"") dhe do të kishte arritur të shkatërronte çdo flotë pushtuese që dërgohej përmes Kanalit të La Manshit. Megjithatë, shumë pak anije të Marinës Mbretërore u vendosën afër rrugëve të mundshme të pushtimit, për shkak se admiralët i frikësoheshin fundosjes nga një sulm ajror gjerman."
mt: "After the battle for France, Germany began to prepare to invade the island of Britain. Germany named the attack with the code ""Operation Sea Lion"". Most of the supplies and heavy weapons of the British army had been lost during its evacuation from Dunkirk and for this reason, the army was very weak. Nevertheless, the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (""Kriegsmarine"") and would have succeeded in destroying any invading fleet that was sent through the Channel of La Manche. However, few ships of the Royal Navy were placed near possible routes of invasion, due to admirals being afraid of being sunk by a German air attack."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: "Pasi mbaroi betejën për Francën, Gjermania nisi të përgatitej për të pushtuar ishullin e Britanisë. Gjermania e emërtoi sulmin me kodin ""Operacioni Luani i Detit"". Pjesa më e madhe e furnizimeve dhe armëve të rënda të ushtrisë britanike kishte humbur gjatë evakuimit të saj nga Dunkirku dhe për këtë arsye, ushtria ishte shumë e dobët. Megjithatë Marina Mbretërore ishte ende shumë më e fortë se Marina Gjermane (""Kriegsmarine"") dhe do të kishte arritur të shkatërronte çdo flotë pushtuese që dërgohej përmes Kanalit të La Manshit. Megjithatë, shumë pak anije të Marinës Mbretërore u vendosën afër rrugëve të mundshme të pushtimit, për shkak se admiralët i frikësoheshin fundosjes nga një sulm ajror gjerman."
mt: "After the battle for France, Germany began to prepare to invade the island of Britain. Germany named the attack with the code ""Operation Sea Lion"". Most of the supplies and heavy weapons of the British army had been lost during its evacuation from Dunkirk and for this reason, the army was very weak. Nevertheless, the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (""Kriegsmarine"") and would have succeeded in destroying any invading fleet that was sent through the Channel of La Manche. However, few ships of the Royal Navy were placed near possible routes of invasion, due to admirals being afraid of being sunk by a German air attack."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: "Fillojmë me një shpjegim për planet e Italisë. Italia konsiderohej kryesisht ""motra e vogël"" e Gjermanisë dhe e Japonisë. Ushtria dhe flota e saj ishte më e dobët, megjithëse ajo sapo kishte ndërtuar katër anije të reja para se të fillonte lufta. Objektivat kryesorë të Italisë ishin vendet afrikane. Për të pushtuar ato vende, ata do të duhej të kishin një platformë për nisjen e trupave që trupat të kalonin Detin Mesdhe dhe të realizonin pushimin e Afrikës. Ata duhej të dëbonin për këtë bazat e anijet britanike në Egjipt. Përveç atyre veprimeve, anijet luftarake italiane nuk duhej të bënin ndonjë gjë tjetër. Tani le të flasim për Japoninë. Japonia, njësoj si Britania, ishte vend ishullor."
mt: "Let's start with an explanation of Italy's planets. Italy was considered mainly the "younger sister" of Germany and Japan. Its army and navy was weaker, although it had just built four new ships before the war began. Italy's main objectives were the African countries. To conquer them, they would have to have a platform for the departure of troops that the troops would cross the Mediterranean Sea and realize the landing of Africa. They would have to remove for this the British ships' bases in Egypt. In addition to those actions, the Italian warships would not have to do anything else. Now let's talk about Japan. Japan, just like Britain, was an island country."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Zbarkimet e Ditës ""D' dhe luftimet pasuese kishin çliruar veriun e Francës, por jugu qëndronte ende i pushtuar. Ai qeverisej nga francezët e regjimit të Vichy-it. Ata ishin francezë që, në vitin 1940, kishin zgjedhur të bënin paqe me gjermanët dhe kishin bashkëpunuar me pushtuesit, në vend që të luftonin kundër tyre. Aleatët pushtuan Francën e Jugut më 15 gusht 1940 dhe pushtimi u emërtua ""Operacioni Dragoi"". Brenda dy javësh, amerikanët dhe forcat e lëvizjes për lirinë e Francës kishin çliruar Francën e Jugut dhe po vazhdonin drejt Gjermanisë."
mt: "Day D landings and subsequent fighting had freed northern France, but the south remained occupied. It was governed by the Vichy regime, French who, in 1940, had chosen to make peace with the Germans and had collaborated with the occupiers, rather than fight against them. The Allies invaded southern France on 15 August 1944 and the invasion was named Operation Dragoon. Within two weeks, Americans and the French Resistance had liberated southern France and were continuing on towards Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Nëndetëset janë anije të projektuara për të udhëtuar nën ujë e qëndrojnë atje për një periudhë kohe të gjatë. Nëndetëset janë përdorur në Luftën e Parë dhe të Dytë Botërore. Në atë kohë, ato ishin të ngadalta dhe kishin një rreze gjuajtjeje shumë të kufizuar. Në fillim të luftës, ato lëviznin kryesisht në sipërfaqen e detit, por me zhvillimin dhe rritjen e saktësisë së radarëve, nëndetëset u detyruan të zhyteshin nën ujë për të shmangur zbulimin e tyre. Nëndetëset gjermane quheshin u-anije. Gjermanët ishin vërtet shumë të aftë në drejtimin dhe përdorimin e nëndetëseve. Si pasojë e suksesit të gjermanëve me nëndetëset, pas luftës, ata nuk ngjallin besueshmëri për t'iu lejuar pasjen e shumë të tillave.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to operate underwater and stay there for a long period of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At that time, they were slow and had a very limited firing range. At the beginning of the war, they moved mainly on the surface of the sea, but with the development and improvement of radars, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were called U-boats. Germans were really very good at directing and using submarines. As a result of the success of the Germans with submarines, after the war, they did not raise confidence to allow the passage of many of them.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Në 17 shtator 1939, tashmë mbrojtja polake ishte thyer dhe e vetmja shpresë ishte tërheqja dhe riorganizimi përgjatë kryeurës rumune. Megjithatë, këto plane dolën jashtë përdorimit pothuajse brenda natës, kur mbi 800 000 ushtarë të Ushtrisë së Kuqe të Bashkimit Sovjetik u futën dhe formuan frontet e Bjellorusisë dhe Ukrainës pas pushtimit të rajoneve të Polonisë Lindore, duke shkelur Traktatin e Paqes të Rigës, Paktin e Mosagresionit Sovjeto-Polak dhe traktatet e tjera ndërkombëtare, si dypalëshe, ashtu dhe shumëpalëshe.
mt: 17 September 1939, Polish defense was broken and the only hope was withdrawal and reorganization along the Romanian border. However, these planes were taken out of service almost overnight, when over 800,000 Red Army soldiers entered and formed the Byelorussian and Ukrainian fronts after the conquest of the Polish Eastern Regions, violating the Treaty of Riga, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other international treaties, as well as multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Gjërat nuk ecën mirë për italianët në Afrikën e Veriut, thuajse që në fillim. Brenda javës së parë nga shpallja e luftës nga Italia më 10 qershor 1940, husarët e regjimentit britanik të 11-të kishin marrë Fort Capuzzo në Libi. Në një pritë në lindje të Bardias, britanikët kapën kryeinxhinierin e Armatës së Dhjetë Italiane, gjeneralin Lastuçi. Në datën 28 qershor, marshalli Italo Balbo, guvernatori i përgjithshëm i Libisë dhe një trashëgimtar i qartë i Musolinit, u vra nga shkëmbime zjarri miqësore, ndërkohë që zbriste në Tobruk.
mt: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa, almost from the start. Within the first week of the declaration of war by Italy on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had taken Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the commander of the 10th Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the governor general of Libya and a clear heir of Mussolini, was shot down by friendly fire, while landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: "Budizmi tibetan bazohet në mësimet e Budës, por u pasurua më tej me mendimin teologjik ""rruga e dashurisë"" të mahajanës e më shumë teknika të jogës indiane. Në parim, budizmi tibetian është shumë i thjeshtë. Ai përfshin jogën kundalini, meditimin dhe rrugën e dashurisë gjithëpërfshirëse. Me jogën Kundalini, energjia Kundalini (energjia e ndriçimit) zgjohet nëpërmjet pozicioneve të jogës, ushtrimeve të frymëmarrjes, mantrave dhe vizualizimeve. Qendra e meditimit tibetan është joga hyjnore. Nëpërmjet paraqitjes vizuale të disa hyjnive, pastrohen kanalet e energjisë, aktivizohen çakrat e krijohet vetëdija e ndriçimit."
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was further developed with the Mahayana school of thought "the path of love" of Mahayana and more Indian yoga techniques. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the all-encompassing path of love. With Kundalini yoga, the Kundalini energy (light energy) is awakened through yoga positions, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is divine yoga. Through the visual presentation of some deities, the energy channels are cleansed, the chakras are activated and the awareness of light is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: "Ky program nisi në orën 8:30 mbasdite me orën lokale (15.00 UTC). Këngëtarë të njohur në të gjithë vendin prezantuan ""bhajan-e"" ose këngë lutjesh te këmbët e Shri Shiamit. Mbrëmja u hap nga këngëtari Sanju Sharma, i ndjekur nga Jai Shankar Choudhary. Ai prezantoi edhe festivalin ""Chhappan Bhog"" mbajtur në nder të Zotit Krishna. Ai shoqërohej nga këngëtari Raju Khandelwal. Më pas, Lakkha Singhu mori drejtimin duke kënduar këngët bhajane. 108 pjata nga Chhappan Bhog (në hinduizëm, 56 artikuj të ndryshëm të ngrënshëm, si ëmbëlsira, fruta, arra, gatime etj. që i ofrohen perëndisë) u ofruan për Baba Shyam. Laka Sing prezantoi edhe ""Chhappan bhog bhajan"". Atë e shoqëronte këngëtari Raju Kandelval."
mt: "This program began at 8:30 am local time (3:00 pm UTC). Well-known singers from all over the country presented "bhajans" or devotional songs to the feet of Shri Shyam. The evening was opened by singer Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. He also presented the festival "Chhappan Bhog" held in honor of Lord Krishna. He was accompanied by singer Raju Khandelwal. Then, Lakkha Singhu took over, singing bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, flowers, dishes, etc. that are offered to the gods) were offered to Baba Shyam. Laka Sing presented the "Chhappan bhog bhajan". He was accompanied by singer Raju Kandelval."
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

Ai shoqërohej nga këngëtari Raju Khandelwal. Më pas, Lakkha Singhu mori drejtimin duke kënduar këngët bhajane. 108 pjata nga Chhappan Bhog (në hinduizëm, 56 artikuj të ndryshëm të ngrënshëm, si ëmbëlsira, fruta, arra, gatime etj. që i ofrohen perëndisë) u ofruan për Baba Shyam. Laka Sing prezantoi edhe ""Chhappan bhog bhajan"". Atë e shoqëronte këngëtari Raju Kandelval."
mt: "This program began at 8:30 am local time (3:00 pm UTC). Well-known singers from all over the country presented "bhajans" or devotional songs to the feet of Shri Shyam. The evening was opened by singer Sanju Sharma, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. He also presented the festival "Chhappan Bhog" held in honor of Lord Krishna. He was accompanied by singer Raju Khandelwal. Then, Lakkha Singhu took over, singing bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, flowers, dishes, etc. that are offered to the gods) were offered to Baba Shyam. Laka Sing presented the "Chhappan bhog bhajan". He was accompanied by singer Raju Kandelval."
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Festimet nisën me një shfaqje speciale nga grupi me famë botërore ""Cirque de Soleil"" (Cirku i Diellit). Ajo u pasua nga Orkestra Simfonike Shtetërore e Stambollit, një orkestër frymore jeniçerësh dhe këngëtarët Faith Erkoç dhe Myslym Gyrses. Më pas, në skenë dolën dervishët rrotullues. Këngëtarja e mirënjohur turke Sezen Aksu interpretoi së bashku me tenorin italian Alessandro Safina dhe këngëtaren greke Haris Alexiou. Në mbyllje, grupi turk i kërcimit ""Zjarri i Anadollit"" interpretoi shfaqjen ""Troja""."
mt: "The festivities began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque de Soleil (Circus of the Sun). It was followed by the State Symphony Orchestra of Istanbul, a Janissary band, and singers Faith Erkoç and Myslym Gyrses. Then, whirling dervishes appeared on stage. Well-known Turkish singer Sezen Aksu performed together with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The closing act was the Turkish dance group Zjarri i Anadollit (Fire of Anatolia) performing the show Troja (Troy)."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Pasagjerëve iu dha ujë gjatë kohës që prisnin në vapën prej 90 º F. Kapiteni i zjarrfikësve, Scott Kouns, tha se ""ishte një ditë e nxehtë në Santa Klara, me temperatura që arrinin 90°F. Cilado që të jetë koha që jeni bllokuar në një tren të ngritur, e pakta që mund të thuhet është se kjo ishte e parehatshme dhe u desh të paktën një orë për ta nxjerrë personin e parë nga udhëtimi""."
mt: "Passengers were given water while they waited in the 90 º F. heat. Captain of the fire trucks, Scott Kouns, said that ""it was a hot day in Santa Clara, with temperatures reaching 90°F. How long you're stranded on a train elevated, little can be said that this was uncomfortable and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the trip.""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Sipas buletinit më të fundit, të dhënat për nivelin e detit tregonin se ishte krijuar një cunami. Në afërsi të Pago Pago dhe Niue, ishin regjistruar disa aktivitete të caktuara cunami. Në Tonga nuk është raportuar për të plagosur apo dëme të mëdha, por energjia elektrike u ndërpre përkohësisht, gjë që siç thuhet i pengoi autoritetet e Tongës të merrnin paralajmërimin për cunami që është dhënë nga PTWC. Katërmbëdhjetë shkolla në Havai, të ndodhura në vijat bregdetare ose afër tyre, u mbyllën ditën e mërkurë, edhe pse paralajmërimet tashmë ishin hequr.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level data showed a tsunami had been generated. In the vicinity of Pago Pago and Niue, some tsunami-related activity was reported. In Tonga, no injuries or major damage was reported, but electricity was briefly interrupted, which as reported prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii, located on or near coastal areas, were closed on Monday, although the warnings were already cancelled.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: "Xhoni Reidi, bashkëpiloti i ekipit të Zelandës së Re në garën e makinave të shpejtësisë A1GP, hyri sot në histori për ngarjen më të shpejtë ligjore të bërë ndonjëherë, mbi urën 48-vjeçare të portit të Oklandit në Zelandën e Re. Z. Reid arriti të ngasë shtatë herë në urë makinën A1GP të Zelandës së Re, ""Black Beauty"" (Bukuroshja e Zezë), me shpejtësi mbi 160 km/h . Policia e Zelandës së Re hasi vështirësi në përdorimin e radarëve të saj të shpejtësisë për të parë se sa shpejt po ecte z. Reid, për shkak se ""Bukuroshja e zezë"" është shumë e ulët dhe të vetmen herë që policia arriti ta kronometrojë z. Reid ishte kur e uli shpejtësinë në 160 km/h."
mt: 2007 A1 Grand Prix of New Zealand
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Një tërmet mesatar goditi Montanën perëndimore në orën 10:08 pasdite ditën e hënë. Në Shërbimin Gjeologjik të SHBA-ve (USGS) dhe Qendrën e tij Kombëtare të Informacioneve mbi Tërmetet, nuk ka mbërritur asnjë raportim i drejtpërdrejtë për dëme. Tërmeti e kishte qendrën afro 20 km (15 mije) në veri-verilindje të Dilonit dhe afro 65 km (40 milje) në jug të Bjutit.
mt: A moderate earthquake struck western Montana at 10:08 p.m. Monday. The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center have not received any direct reports of damage. The quake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northwest of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Burgut Abu Ghraib në Irak i është vënë zjarri gjatë një trazire. Burgu mori famë të keqe pas zbulimit të abuzimit ndaj të burgosurve të atjeshëm pas marrjes së kontrollit nga forcat amerikane.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set ablaze during a riot. The prison gained notoriety after the discovery of abuse of its inmates after the U.S. took control of the facility.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Grupi anuloi shfaqjen në War Memorial Stadium në Maui, e cila pritej të ndiqej nga 9000 persona dhe u kërkoi falje admiruesve. Shoqëria e menaxhimit të grupit, HK Management Inc., nuk dha fillimisht asnjë arsye për anulimin më 20 shtator, por, ditën tjetër, ia vunë fajin logjistikës.
mt: The group canceled the show at War Memorial Stadium in Maui, which was expected to be followed by 9,000 people, and asked for an apology from fans. The group's management company, HK Management Inc., did not initially give any reason for the cancellation on September 20, but the next day blamed logistics.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Nga sa thuhet, grabitja e përgjithshme vijoi gjithë natën, meqenëse nuk kishte oficerë policie në rrugët e Bishkekut. Bishkeku u përshkrua nga një vëzhgues si i zhytur në një gjendje ""anarkie"", pasi grupe njerëzish bridhnin rrugëve dhe grabitnin dyqanet me mallra konsumi. Disa banorë të Bishkekut fajësuan protestuesit nga jugu për shkeljet e kryera ligjore."
mt: "From what is said, the general looting continued throughout the night, as there were no police officers on the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek was described by an observer as being in a state of "anarchy," as groups of people blocked roads and looted shops selling consumer goods. Some residents of Bishkek blamed southern protesters for the lawbreaking."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: "Më parë, drejtori ekzekutiv i ""Ring"", Xhemi Siminof, theksoi se shoqëria nisi aktivitetin kur nuk mund ta dëgjonte zilen e derës së dyqanit të tij në garazhin e tij. Ai tha se kishte konceptuar një zile dere e cila funksiononte përmes WiFi-së. Siminof tha se shitjet u rritën pas shfaqjes së tij të vitit 2013 në episodin ""Shark tank"" ku drejtuesit e shfaqjes e refuzuan financimin e biznesit të ri (startup). Në fund të vitit 2017, Siminofi u shfaq në kanalin televiziv të blerjeve QVC. ""Ring"" zgjidhi po ashtu procesin gjyqësor me një shoqëri sigurimi konkurrente,""ADT Corporation""."
mt: Earlier, Ring CEO Xhemi Siminof said the company started operations when he could not hear the doorbell of his garage. He said he had conceived a doorbell that worked through Wi-Fi. Siminof said sales increased after his appearance in the 2013 episode of "Shark tank" where the show's executives rejected financing the new business (startup). In the end of 2017, Siminof appeared on the QVC shopping channel. "Ring" also resolved the same legal process with a competing security company, "ADT Corporation".
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Programi PBS ka fituar më shumë se dy duzina çmime Emmy dhe kohëzgjatja e tij është më e shkurtër se Sesame Street dhe Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Çdo episod i programit do të fokusohet te një temë në një libër specifik dhe, më pas, do ta eksplorojë atë temë nëpërmjet historive të shumta. Çdo program jepte gjithashtu rekomandime për librat që duhet të kërkonin fëmijët kur të shkonin në bibliotekën e tyre. Xhon Grant, nga ""WNED Buffalo"" (stacioni ku u transmetua ""Reading Rainbow"") tha: """"Reading Rainbow"" u mësoi fëmijëve arsyen për të lexuar,... dashurinë për leximin - [programi] i nxiti fëmijët të zgjidhnin një libër dhe ta lexonin"". Disa, përfshirë John Grant, besojnë se kriza e financimit dhe ndryshimi i filozofisë së programit televiziv edukativ ndikuan në mbylljen e serialit."
mt: PBS has won more than two dozen Emmys and its run was shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the program focused on a theme in a specific book and then explored that theme through many stories. Each program also gave recommendations for books that children should look for at their library. John Grant, from ""WNED Buffalo"" (the station where ""Reading Rainbow"" was broadcasted) said: """"Reading Rainbow"" taught children the reasons to read,... the love of reading - [the program] encouraged children to choose a book and read it"". Some, including John Grant, believe that the financial crisis and the change of the educational television program's philosophy contributed to the series' cancellation.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

Each episode of the program focused on a theme in a specific book and then explored that theme through many stories. Each program also gave recommendations for books that children should look for at their library. John Grant, from ""WNED Buffalo"" (the station where ""Reading Rainbow"" was broadcasted) said: """"Reading Rainbow"" taught children the reasons to read,... the love of reading - [the program] encouraged children to choose a book and read it"". Some, including John Grant, believe that the financial crisis and the change of the educational television program's philosophy contributed to the series' cancellation.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Zyrtarët e qytetit të Amsterdamit dhe Muzeut të Ana Frankut deklarojnë se pema është e infektuar me një kërpudhë dhe përbën rrezik për shëndetin publik, duke argumentuar se i kanosej rreziku për t'u rrëzuar nga çasti në çast. Ishte planifikuar të pritej ditën e martë, por shpëtoi pas një vendimi gjyqësor të marrë urgjentisht.
mt: City officials and the Anne Frank Museum declare that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health risk, arguing that it risks falling at any moment. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but escaped after an urgent court decision was taken.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Çlirimi i Kafshëve dhe Shoqëria Mbretërore për Parandalimin e Mizorisë kundrejt Kafshëve (RSPCA) po bëjnë përsëri thirrje për instalimin e detyrueshëm të kamerave televizive me qark të mbyllur në gjithë thertoret e Australisë. Kryeinspektori i RSPCA-së së Uellsit të Ri Jugor, David Oshanesi, u shpreh për ABC-në se mbikëqyrja dhe kontrollet e thertoreve duhet të ishin normale në Australi. ""Televizioni me qark të mbyllur CCTV dëshiron t'u dërgojë sigurisht një sinjal të fortë atyre personave që punojnë me kafshët se mirëqenia e tyre ka përparësinë më të madhe""."
mt: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) is again calling for the mandatory installation of closed-circuit television cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA South Australia chief inspector David Oshanesi told ABC that monitoring and control of abattoirs should be normal in Australia. "Closed-circuit television CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare has the highest priority," he said.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: "Në komunitetin Red Lake sot, ndërkohë që kryheshin funeralet për Jeff Weise dhe tre nga nëntë viktimat, u përhap lajmi se ishte arrestuar një student tjetër në lidhje me sulmet me armë të 21 marsit në shkollë. Autoritetet u shprehën pak në mënyrë zyrtare, përveç pohimit të arrestimit të sotëm. Megjithatë, një burim që kishte dijeni për hetimin tha për ""Star-Tribune"" të Mineapolisit se ishte Lui Xhordeini, djali 16-vjeçar i Kryetarit të Fisit të Red Lejk, Fllojd Xhordein. Në këtë moment, nuk dihet se çfarë akuzash do të ngrihen ose se çfarë i ka drejtuar autoritetet te ky djalë, por në gjykatën federale ka filluar tashmë procesi për të miturin."
mt: In the Red Lake community today, while funerals were held for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, the news spread that another student had been arrested in connection with the March 21 school shootings. Authorities were reticent in their official statements, except to confirm the arrest today. However, a source familiar with the investigation told the "Star-Tribune" of Minneapolis that it was Lui Xhordeini, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Chairman Fllojd Xhordein. It is not yet known what charges will be brought or what direction authorities have taken this boy, but federal court proceedings have already begun for the defendant.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organizatorët e protestës thanë se rreth 100 000 persona dolën në qytetet e Gjermanisë, të tilla si Berlini, Këlni, Hamburgu dhe Hanoveri. Policia përllogariti 6500 protestues në Berlin. Protesta u zhvilluan edhe në Paris, në Sofje të Bullgarisë, Vilnius të Lituanisë, Valetë të Maltës, Talin të Estonisë dhe në Edinburg e Glasgou të Skocisë. Në Londër, rreth 200 persona protestuan para zyrave të titullarëve kryesorë të të drejtave të autorit. Muajin e kaluar, në Poloni u zhvilluan protesta të mëdha kur ai shtet nënshkroi marrëveshjen ACTA, gjë që e bëri qeverinë polake të vendosë që të mos e ratifikonte marrëveshjen, për momentin. Letonia dhe Sllovakia kanë vonuar të dyja procesin e përfshirjen në marrëveshjen ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people came out in cities across Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valletta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, around 200 people protested outside the offices of senior copyright officials. Last month, in Poland, there were large protests when the country signed the ACTA agreement, which made the Polish government decide not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining the ACTA agreement.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Janë njoftuar rreth 60 raste të mbinxehjes së iPod-eve që funksiononin keq, duke shkaktuar gjashtë zjarre në total dhe duke lënë katër persona me djegie të vogla. Ministria e Ekonomisë, Tregtisë dhe Industrisë së Japonisë (METI) deklaroi se ishte vënë në dijeni për 27 aksidentet e lidhura me pajisjet. Ministria e Ekonomisë, Tregtisë dhe Industrisë njoftoi javën e kaluar se ""Apple"" e kishte informuar për 34 incidente të tjera mbinxehjeje, të cilat shoqëria i quajti ""joserioze"". Ministria reagoi duke e cilësuar shtyrjen e raportit nga Apple ""vërtet për të ardhur keq""."
mt: 60 cases of iPod overheating have been reported, causing six fires in total and leaving four people with minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) declared that it had been informed of 27 incidents related to the devices. The ministry reported last week that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "minor". The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "very bad".
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Drejtori ekzekutiv i ""Apple"", Stiv Xhobs, zbuloi pajisjen ndërkohë që ecte në skenë dhe duke e nxjerrë iPhone nga xhepi i xhinseve. Gjatë fjalimit të tij 2-orësh, ai tha se ""Sot, Apple do të rishpikë telefonin. Ne sot do të hyjmë në histori""."
mt: "Apple's CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device while walking on stage and pulling an iPhone from his pocket. During his two-hour speech, he said, ""Today, Apple will enter history."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Senatorja aktuale dhe Zonja e Parë e Argjentinës, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, shpalli dje në mbrëmje kandidaturën për presidente në La Plata, një qytet rreth 50 kilometra (31 milje) nga Buenos Airesi. Znj. Kirshner e shpalli qëllimin e saj për të kandiduar për presidente në Teatrin e Argjentinës, në të njëjtin vend që përdori për të nisur fushatën e saj të vitit 2005 për në Senat si anëtare e delegacionit të provincës së Buenos-Ajresit.
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Teatro Argentino, the same venue she used to launch her 2005 Senate campaign as a delegate from the Buenos Aires province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Autoriteti Australian i Komunikimeve dhe Medias konstatoi gjithashtu se, pavarësisht transmetimit të videos në internet, Big Brother nuk kishte shkelur ligjet e censurës së përmbajtjes në internet, pasi videoja nuk ishte ruajtur në uebsajtin e Big Brother. Ligji ""Për shërbimet e transmetimeve"" parashikon rregullimin e përmbajtjes së internetit, por në mënyrë që përmbajtja në internet të konsiderohet si e tillë, duhet të jetë fizikisht në një server."
mt: The Australian Communications and Media Authority also found that, despite the video's transmission on the Internet, Big Brother had not broken Internet content censorship laws, as the video was not stored on the Big Brother website. The "Broadcasting Services" Act regulates Internet content, but for Internet content to be considered as such, it must be physically on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Piter Kostelo, drejtori i thesarit australian dhe njeriu që ka më shumë mundësi të pasojë kryeministrin Xhon Houard si kryetar i Partisë Liberale, ka vendosur të mbështesë një industri të energjisë bërthamore në Australi. Z. Kostelo tha se kur prodhimi i energjisë bërthamore të jetë ekonomikisht fitimprurës, Australia duhet të kërkojë përdorimin e saj. ""Nëse ai bëhet tregtar, ne duhet ta kemi. Pra, nuk kemi asnjë kundërshtim në parim për energjinë bërthamore"", - tha z. Costello."
mt: "Peter Costello, director of the Australian Treasury and the man with the best chance of succeeding John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has decided to support an industry of nuclear energy in Australia. Mr. Costello said that when the production of nuclear energy is economically profitable, Australia should seek its use. "If it becomes a trader, we should have it. So, we have no objection in principle to nuclear energy," - said Mr. Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: "Me vetëm tetëmbëdhjetë medalje të disponueshme në ditë, disa shtete nuk kanë arritur të ngjiten në podiumin e medaljeve. Ato përfshijnë Holandën, me Anna Jochemsen që përfundoi në vendin e nëntë në klasifikimin e Super-G për femra dje, dhe Finlandën me Katja Saarinen, e cila përfundoi në vendin e dhjetë në të njëjtin aktivitet. Miçëll Gurlei i Australisë përfundoi i njëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj në këmbë. Konkurrenti çek Oldrih Jelinek përfundoi i gjashtëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj ulur. Arli Velaskez i Meksikës përfundoi i pesëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj ulur. Adam Hall i Zelandës së Re përfundoi i nënti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj në këmbë. Skiatori i ekipit polak në kategorinë e atletëve me shikim të dëmtuar Maciej Krezel dhe shoqëruesja e tij Anna Ogarzynska u renditën të trembëdhjetët në Kampionatin Botëror të Skive Alpine ""Super-G"". Jong Seork Park i Koresë së Jugut e përfundoi garën i 24-ti."
mt: 18 medals available today, some countries have not been able to climb the podium of medals. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen who finished ninth in the Super-G for women yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen, who finished tenth in the same event. Australian Michelle Gurley finished eleventh in the men's giant slalom. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished 28th in the men's giant slalom. Arli Velasquez of Mexico finished 30th in the men's giant slalom. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's giant slalom. The Polish team in the category of athletes with impaired vision Maciej Krezel and his companion Anna Ogarzynska were ranked 23rd in the World Alpine Skiing Championship "Super-G". Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished the race in 24th.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Me vetëm tetëmbëdhjetë medalje të disponueshme në ditë, disa shtete nuk kanë arritur të ngjiten në podiumin e medaljeve. Ato përfshijnë Holandën, me Anna Jochemsen që përfundoi në vendin e nëntë në klasifikimin e Super-G për femra dje, dhe Finlandën me Katja Saarinen, e cila përfundoi në vendin e dhjetë në të njëjtin aktivitet. Miçëll Gurlei i Australisë përfundoi i njëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj në këmbë. Konkurrenti çek Oldrih Jelinek përfundoi i gjashtëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj ulur. Arli Velaskez i Meksikës përfundoi i pesëmbëdhjeti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj ulur. Adam Hall i Zelandës së Re përfundoi i nënti në sllallomin e madh për meshkuj në këmbë. Skiatori i ekipit polak në kategorinë e atletëve me shikim të dëmtuar Maciej Krezel dhe shoqëruesja e tij Anna Ogarzynska u renditën të trembëdhjetët në Kampionatin Botëror të Skive Alpine ""Super-G"". Jong Seork Park i Koresë së Jugut e përfundoi garën i 24-ti."

src: "Gjyqi u zhvillua në Gjykatën e Kurorës të Birmingamit dhe përfundoi më 3 gusht. Prezantuesi, i arrestuar në vendngjarje, e mohoi sulmin e pretendoi se e përdori shkopin për t'u mbrojtur veten nga shishet që i kishin hedhur deri në tridhjetë persona. Bllejku u shpall fajtor edhe për tentativën për të penguar ushtrimin e drejtësisë. Gjykatësi i tha Blleikut se dërgimi i tij në burg ishte ""pothuajse i pashmangshëm"" ."
mt: The trial was held at Birmingham Crown Court and ended on 3 August. The presenter, arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed to have used the stick to protect himself from bottles thrown by up to thirty people. Blleek was found guilty of attempting to obstruct the administration of justice. The judge told Blleek that his sentence was ""virtually inevitable"".
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Temat e tjera të rendit të ditës në Bali përfshijnë shpëtimin e pyjeve që kanë mbetur në botë dhe përdorimin e përbashkët të teknologjive për t'i ndihmuar vendet në zhvillim që të zhvillohen me mënyra më pak ndotëse. Kombet e Bashkuara shpresojnë gjithashtu të kenë gati një fond në ndihmë të shteteve të dëmtuara nga ngrohja globale për tu përballur me efektet. Paratë mund të përdoren për shtëpi që i rezistojnë përmbytjes, administrim më të mirë të ujit dhe diversifikim të të korrave.
mt: Other topics on the day's agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests and shared use of technologies to help developing countries develop in less polluting ways. The United Nations also hopes to have ready a fund to help countries hurt by global warming to cope with the effects. The money could be used for homes that resist flooding, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigeria lajmëroi më parë se planifikonte të anëtarësohej në AfCFTA gjatë javës para samitit. Komisioneri i tregtisë dhe industrisë së Bashkimit Afrikan, Albert Muçanga, njoftoi se pritej që edhe shteti i Beninit të bëhej pjesë e kësaj strukture. Komisioneri tha: ""Ne nuk i kemi miratuar ende rregullat e origjinës dhe koncesionet tarifore, por kuadri rregullator ekzistues mjafton për të nisur tregtinë më 1 korrik 2020""."
mt: Nigeria earlier announced that it planned to join AfCFTA during the week before the summit. The African Union's Commissioner for Trade and Industry, Albert Muchanga, announced that Benin was also expected to become part of this structure. The Commissioner said: "We have not yet approved the rules of origin and tariff concessions, but the existing regulatory framework is sufficient to start trade on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: "Ajo mori vlerësime kritike gjatë kohës që shërbeu në Atlanta dhe u vlerësua për arsimin novator urban. Në vitin 2009, asaj iu dha titulli ""Superdrejtoresha Kombëtare e Vitit"". Në momentin që fituan çmimin, shkollat e Atlantës kishin arritur një përmirësim të madh të rezultateve të provimeve. Pak kohë më pas, gazeta Atlanta Journal-Constitution botoi një raport që tregonte probleme me rezultatet e testeve. Raporti tregoi se rezultatet e provimeve ishin rritur me shpejtësi të pabesueshme dhe pohonte se shkolla zbuloi probleme të brendshme, por nuk mori masa për konstatimet. Provat vijuese treguan se kishte pasur manipulim të testimeve. Në vitin 2013, Beverly Hall bashkë me 34 zyrtarë të tjerë të arsimit u paditën."
mt: "She received critical reviews during her time in Atlanta and was praised for her innovative urban education. In 2009, she was awarded the title of "National Superintendent of the Year." At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had made significant improvements in test scores. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that showed problems with test scores. The report showed that test scores had increased at an unprecedented rate and alleged that the school discovered internal problems but did not take action to address them. Subsequent investigations showed that there had been cheating on the tests. In 2013, Beverly Hall and 34 other education officials were indicted."
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Një bombë shpërtheu jashtë zyrës së guvernatorit të përgjithshëm. Tri bomba të tjera shpërthyen afër ndërtesave shtetërore në një periudhë dyorëshe. Disa njoftime vlerësojnë se numri zyrtar i viktimave është tetë dhe njoftimet zyrtare konfirmojnë se kishte deri në 30 të plagosur; por numrat përfundimtarë nuk dihen ende.
mt: 1. A bomb exploded outside the governor's office. 2. Three other bombs exploded near government buildings in a two-hour period. 3. Some reports estimate the official number of casualties is eight and official reports confirm there were up to 30 injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: "21-vjeçari Jezus u bashkua me ""Mançester Sitin"" vitin e kaluar në janar 2017 nga klubi brazilian ""Palmeiras"" në këmbim të një tarife të njoftuar prej 27 milionë paundësh. Që nga ajo kohë, futbollisti brazilian ka përfaqësuar klubin në 53 ndeshje në të gjitha kompeticionet dhe ka shënuar 24 gola."
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined "Manchester City" last year in January 2017 from the Brazilian club "Palmeiras" in exchange for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian footballer has represented the club in 53 matches in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Rreth orës 10 të këtij mëngjesi sipas orës vendëse, u shemb një bujtinë në Mekë, në qytetin e shenjtë të Islamit. Ndërtesa strehoi disa pelegrinë që erdhën për një vizitë në qytetin e shenjtë në vigjilje të pelegrinazhit të haxhit. Klientët e bujtinës ishin përgjithësisht shtetas të Emirateve të Bashkuara Arabe. Numri i viktimave është të paktën 15, një numër që pritet të rritet.
mt: 10:00 am local time, a bomb exploded in a restaurant in Mecca, the holy city of Islam. The building housed some pilgrims who came for a visit to the holy city in the vigil of the hajj pilgrimage. The restaurant's customers were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The number of victims is at least 15, a number that is expected to increase.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelitët, të cilët peshonin më shumë se 1000 paund së bashku dhe udhëtonin me afërsisht 17 500 milje në orë, u përplasën 491 milje mbi Tokë. Sipas shkencëtarëve, përplasja kishte shkaktuar një shpërthim shumë të madh. Ata po përpiqen akoma të përcaktojnë se sa e madhe ishte përplasja dhe çfarë ndikimi do të ketë në Tokë. Komanda Strategjike e SHBA-së e Zyrës së Departamentit të Mbrojtjes së SHBA-së po gjurmon mbetjet. Rezultati i analizës grafike do të botohet në një uebsajt publik.
mt: 2 satellites, which together weighed more than 1000 pounds and traveled at about 17 500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above Earth. According to scientists, the collision had caused a very large explosion. They are still trying to determine how large the collision was and what impact it will have on Earth. The Strategic Command of the United States Department of Defense is monitoring the debris. The results of the graphic analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Bateni u rendit i 190-ti në listën e 400 amerikanëve më të pasur në vitin 2008, me një pasuri të vlerësuar me 2,3 miliardë dollarë. Ai u diplomua nga Kolegji i Arteve dhe Shkencave në Universitetin e Virxhinias në vitin 1950 dhe ishte një dhurues i rëndësishëm i atij institucioni.
mt: 190th in the list of 400 richest Americans in 2008, with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major benefactor of that institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Guvernatori i Kalifornisë, Arnold Shvarzeneger, ratifikoi një projektligj që ndalon shitjen ose dhënien me qira të videolojërave të dhunshme ndaj të miturve. Projektligji kërkon që videolojërat e dhunshme që shiten në shtetin e Kalifornisë të etiketohen me një etiketë ku shkruhet ""18"" dhe sjell dënimin e shitjes së tyre për të miturit me një gjobë prej 1000 $ për çdo shkelje."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled with a ""18"" sticker and carries a $1000 fine for each violation."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvalli, që është i martuar dhe me dy fëmijë të rritur, nuk i bëri përshtypje të madhe Millerit, me të cilin kishte lidhje kjo histori. Kur u pyet për komente, Miller tha se ""Mike flet shumë gjatë seancës dëgjimore… Unë po përgatitesha, kështu që nuk po e dëgjova vërtet se çfarë po thoshte."""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has two grown children, didn't make much of an impression on Miller, with whom this story was linked. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the listening session… I'm preparing, so I wasn't really listening to what he was saying.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Duvalli, që është i martuar dhe me dy fëmijë të rritur, nuk i bëri përshtypje të madhe Millerit, me të cilin kishte lidhje kjo histori. Kur u pyet për komente, Miller tha se ""Mike flet shumë gjatë seancës dëgjimore… Unë po përgatitesha, kështu që nuk po e dëgjova vërtet se çfarë po thoshte."""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has two grown children, didn't make much of an impression on Miller, with whom this story was linked. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the listening session… I'm preparing, so I wasn't really listening to what he was saying.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Kryeministri Stefen Harper ka dakordësuar ta dërgojë ligjin e qeverisë ""Për ajrin e pastër"" për shqyrtim, para leximit të tij të dytë, te një komitet i përbërë nga të gjitha partitë, pas takimit 25-minutësh të së martës me kryetarin e Partisë Demokratike të Re, Xhek Lajton, në zyrën e kryeministrit. Lajtoni kishte kërkuar ndryshime në projektligjin e konservatorëve për mjedisin gjatë takimit me kryeministrin, duke kërkuar një ""rishkrim tërësor dhe të plotë"" të projektligjit të Partisë Konservatore për mjedisin. Që nga momenti që Qeveria Federale ndërhyri për marrjen përsipër të financimit të spitalit ""Mersey"" në Devonport në Tazmani, qeveria e shtetit dhe disa deputetë federalë e kanë kritikuar këtë ligj si një pengesë në fillim të zgjedhjeve federale që do të organizohen në nëntor. Por Kryeministri John Howard ka thënë se ligji kishte vetëm synimin për të mbrojtur godinën e spitalit nga përkeqësimi prej qeverisë tasmaniane, duke dhënë 45 milionë AUD$ shtesë."
mt: 25 minutes after the meeting with the leader of the Democratic Party, Jack Layton, in the Prime Minister's office, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" for review, before its second reading, to a committee made up of all parties. Layton had asked for changes in the Conservative Party's environmental conservation bill during the meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a "complete and comprehensive rewording" of the bill. Since the Federal Government intervened to take over the funding of the "Mersey" hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized the bill as a roadblock to the federal elections that will be held in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said the bill had only the intention to protect the hospital's building from the Tasmanian government's deterioration, giving an additional 45 million AUD$.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: "Acidi cianurik dhe melamina u gjetën së bashku në kampionet e urinës së kafshëve shtëpiake që ngordhën pas ngrënies së ushqimit të infektuar për kafshët shtëpiake. ""Dy komponimet reagojnë me njëri-tjetrin duke krijuar kristale të cilat mund të bllokojnë funksionimin e veshkave"", - shprehen studiuesit e universitetit. Studiuesit vunë re kristalet e krijuara në urinën e maceve prej shtimit të melaminës e acidit cianurik. Përbërja e këtyre kristaleve përputhet me ato të gjetura në urinën e kafshëve shtëpiake të prekura kur krahasohen me anë të spektroskopisë infra të kuqe (FTIR)."
mt: "Cyanuric acid and melamine were found together in the urine samples of household pets that died after eating the contaminated pet food. ""The two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can block kidney function,"" the researchers said. The researchers found crystals formed in the urine of cats fed melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of household pets that were affected when compared using infrared spectroscopy (FTIR)."
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: """Xinhua"" njoftoi se hetuesit e shtetit gjetën të mërkurën dy regjistrues fluturimesh të tipit ""kuti e zezë"". Lunës ju bënë nderime edhe nga kolegët mundës. Tomi Drimer tha: ""Luna ishte mbretëresha e parë e ekstremit. Menaxherja ime e parë. Luna vdiq natën me dy hëna. Mjaft e rrallë, si vetë ajo. Grua e fortë."" Dastin ""Goldast"" Ranelsi komentoi që: ""Luna ishte aq e çuditshme sa unë... ndoshta akoma më shumë... e dua dhe do më marrë malli për të... shpresoj të jetë në një vend më të mirë""."
mt: "Xinhua" reported that state investigators found two flight recorders of the "black box" type on Wednesday. Lunas received tributes even from colleagues. Tomi Drimer said: "Luna was the first queen of the extremities. My first manager. Luna died on the night of the two moons. Enough rare, like herself. The strong woman." Dastin "Goldast" Ranelsi commented that: "Luna was so amazing as I... maybe even more... I love and will miss her... I hope she is in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""
