src: "Megjithëse brenda shtëpisë ishin tre persona kur makina u përplas me të, asnjë prej tyre nuk u dëmtua. Megjithatë, shoferi pësoi plagosje të rënda në kokë. Rruga ku ngjau përplasja ishte përkohësisht e mbyllur, ndërkohë që shërbimet e urgjencës liruan shoferin nga ""Audi TT"" i kuq. Ai u shtrua fillimisht në spitalin ""James Paget"" në Greit-Jarmuth. Ai u transferua më vonë në spitalin e Addenbrooke në Kembrixh."
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car hit it, none were injured. However, the driver sustained serious head injuries. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed, while emergency services freed the driver from the red "Audi TT". He was initially taken to the "James Paget" hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to the Addenbrooke's hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Lojërat nisën në orën 10:00 p.d. me një mot të shkëlqyer dhe, përveç vesës së shiut nga mesi i mëngjesit e cila pushoi shpejt, ishte një ditë e përkryer për ragbi me 7. Konkurrentja në krye të klasifikimit, Afrika e Jugut, e filloi mbarë kur mori një fitore të lehtë 26 - 0 kundër Zambias, konkurrentes në vendin e 5-të. Me pamje pa dyshim të lodhur në ndeshjen kundër motrave të saj jugore, Afrika e Jugut gjithsesi u përmirësua vazhdimisht ndërsa turneu përparonte. Mbrojtja e tyre e disiplinuar, aftësitë e mbajtjes së topit dhe bashkëpunimi i shkëlqyer si ekip i bëri të dalloheshin dhe ishte e qartë se ky ishte ekipi që duhej mposhtur.
mt: The match started at 10:00 am with a bright and sunny day, and, except for the drizzle from mid-morning which stopped quickly, it was a perfect day for rugby sevens. The top-ranked South Africa started off strong when they easily defeated Zambia, the fifth-ranked team, 26-0. Clearly exhausted from their match against their southern sisters, South Africa improved steadily as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball-handling skills, and outstanding team play made them stand out, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Gjatë tre dhjetëvjeçarëve të fundit, Kina ka zhvilluar ekonominë e tregut, megjithëse ka mbetur zyrtarisht shtet komunist. Reformat e para ekonomike u kryen gjatë udhëheqjes së Deng Xiaopingut. Që nga ajo kohë, ekonomia e Kinës është rritur me 90 herë. Gjatë vitit të kaluar, Kina eksportoi për herë të parë më shumë automjete se Gjermania dhe i kaloi Shtetet e Bashkuara si tregun më të madh në këtë industri. Brenda dy dekadash, PBB-ja e Kinës mund të jetë më e madhe se ajo e Shteteve të Bashkuara të Amerikës.
mt: Over the past three decades, China has developed its market economy, although it has remained officially a communist state. The first economic reforms were carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 times. Last year, China exported more automobiles than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market in this industry. Within two decades, China's GDP could be larger than that of the United States of America.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Ne do të përpiqemi të ulim emetimet e dyoksidit të karbonit për njësi të PBB-së deri në vitin 2020 me një dallim të dukshëm nga niveli i vitit 2005"", - pohoi Huja. Ai nuk caktoi asnjë shifër për shkurtimet e bëra dhe tha se përllogaritja do të bëhet në bazë të prodhimit ekonomik të Kinës. Huja i nxiti vendet në zhvillim ""të shmangnin mënyrën e vjetër sipas të cilës, në fillim, ndotet dhe më pas, pastrohet"". Ai shtoi se: ""Sidoqoftë, atyre nuk duhet t'u kërkohet të marrin përsipër detyrime që e tejkalojnë fazën e zhvillimit, përgjegjësinë dhe aftësitë e tyre""."
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said. He did not set any specific targets and said the calculation would be based on China's economic output. Hu urged developing countries to "avoid the old way of first polluting and then cleaning up." He added: "However, they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that exceed their development stage, responsibility and capacity."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Shoqata bamirëse mjekësore ""Mangola"", Mjekët pa Kufi dhe Organizata Botërore e Shëndetit thonë se është shpërthimi më i rëndë i regjistruar në vend. Zëdhënësi i organizatës ""Mjekët pa kufij"", Richard Veerman, tha: ""Angola po shkon drejt shpërthimit më të keq të sëmundjes të parë ndonjëherë dhe situata vazhdon të jetë shumë e keqe në Angolë,"" tha ai."
mt: The Medical Relief Society "Mangola", Doctors Without Borders and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. The organization's spokesman, Richard Veerman, said: "Angola is heading towards the worst outbreak of the disease ever and the situation is still very bad in Angola," he said.
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Drejtori i Prokurorisë së Përgjithshme, Kier Starmer QC, bëri një deklaratë sot në mëngjes ku thuhej se Huhne dhe Pryce ishin nën akuzë. Huhne ka dhënë dorëheqjen dhe do të zëvendësohet në kabinetin e ministrave nga deputeti Ed Davey. Deputeti Norman Lamb pritet të marrë detyrën e Ministrit të Tregtisë që do të lihet nga Davey. Huhne dhe Pryce janë caktuar për t'u paraqitur në Gjykatën e Magjistratëve në Westminster në datën 16 shkurt.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, made a statement this morning saying that Huhne and Pryce were under investigation. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the Cabinet by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb is expected to take the role of Trade Minister which will be left by Davey. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Drejtori i Prokurorisë së Përgjithshme, Kier Starmer QC, bëri një deklaratë sot në mëngjes ku thuhej se Huhne dhe Pryce ishin nën akuzë. Huhne ka dhënë dorëheqjen dhe do të zëvendësohet në kabinetin e ministrave nga deputeti Ed Davey. Deputeti Norman Lamb pritet të marrë detyrën e Ministrit të Tregtisë që do të lihet nga Davey. Huhne dhe Pryce janë caktuar për t'u paraqitur në Gjykatën e Magjistratëve në Westminster në datën 16 shkurt.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, made a statement this morning saying that Huhne and Pryce were under investigation. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the Cabinet by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb is expected to take the role of Trade Minister which will be left by Davey. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Historia e prezantuar në operën franceze nga Kamij Sen-Sans i dedikohet një artisti, ""jeta e të cilit diktohet nga dashuria për drogat dhe Japoninë"". Si rezultat, interpretuesit tymosin cigare kanabisi në skenë dhe vetë teatri e nxit publikun tu bashkohet."
mt: The history presented in the French opera by Camille Saint-Saëns is dedicated to an artist, "whose life is dictated by love for drugs and Japan." As a result, the actors smoke cannabis cigarettes on stage and the theater encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Leonovi, që njihet edhe si ""kozmonauti nr. 11"", bënte pjesë në ekipin fillestar të kozmonautëve të Bashkimit Sovjetik. Më 18 mars 1965, ai zhvilloi aktivitetin e parë jashtë anijes kozmike të pajisur me ekuipazh (EVA) ose ""shëtitjen në kozmos"", duke qëndruar vetëm jashtë anijes për pak më shumë se dymbëdhjetë minuta. Atij iu akordua çmimi ""Hero i Bashkimit Sovjetik"", nderimi më i lartë i Bashkimit Sovjetik, për punën e tij. Dhjetë vite më pas, ai drejtoi pjesën sovjetike të misionit Apollo-Soyuz, duke simbolizuar përfundimin e garës hapësinore."
mt: "Leonov, who is also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11," was a member of the original Soviet cosmonaut team. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA) or "space walk," remaining outside the spacecraft for just over 12 minutes. He was awarded the title "Hero of the Soviet Union," the highest honor of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet portion of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, symbolizing the end of the space race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Pasi ndodhi aksidenti, Gibsoni u transportua në spital, për të gjetur vdekjen pak çaste më vonë. Shoferi i kamionit, i moshës 64 vjeç, nuk u lëndua në përplasje. Automjeti i aksidentuar u hoq nga vendngjarja në mesditë, rreth orës 12:00 GMT të po asaj dite. Një person, i cili punonte në një garazh afër vendit të aksidentit tha: ""Ishin disa fëmijë që po prisnin për të kaluar rrugën dhe të gjithë po bërtisnin e po qanin."" Ata u kthyen të gjithë me vrap nga vendi ku kishte ngjarë aksidenti."
mt: "After the accident, Gibson was transported to the hospital, where he was pronounced dead a few minutes later. The truck driver, aged 64, was not injured in the collision. The damaged vehicle was removed from the scene by midday, around 12:00 GMT on the same day. A person who worked at a nearby garage near the site of the accident said: ""There were some children who were waiting to cross the road and everyone was screaming and crying."" They all turned back and ran from the scene of the accident."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Puna e kryer ishte më tepër teorike edhe pse programi u hartua për simulimin e vrojtimeve të kryera mbi galaktikën e Shigjetarit. Efekti që po kërkonte ekipi mund të shkaktohej nga forcat baticore mes materies së zezë në galaktikë dhe materies së zezë në Rrugën e Qumështit. Ashtu siç Hëna ushtron forcë tërheqëse mbi Tokën dhe shkakton batica, ashtu edhe Rruga e Qumështit ushtron forcë mbi yjësinë e Shigjetarit. Shkencëtarët arritën të dilnin në përfundimin se materia e zezë ka një ndikim në një materie tjetër të zezë në të njëjtën mënyrë si materia e zakonshme. Sipas kësaj teorie, pjesa më e madhe e materies së zezë rreth një galaktike ndodhet rreth galaktikës në një formë aureole dhe përbëhet nga shumë grimca të vogla.
mt: The work was more theoretical, although the program was designed for simulation of observations made on the Milky Way galaxy. The effect the team was seeking could be caused by dark matter between the Milky Way and the Milky Way's dark matter. As the Moon exerts a pull on Earth and causes tides, so the Milky Way exerts a pull on the Milky Way's dark matter. Scientists came to the conclusion that dark matter has an effect on another dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. According to this theory, most of the dark matter around a galaxy is around the galaxy in the form of an aureole and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Debati u ndez nga polemikat mbi shpenzimet për ndihmën dhe rindërtimin menjëherë pas uraganit Katrina, të cilat janë etiketuar me humor si ""Marrëveshja e Bushit për Nju Orleansin"" nga disa konservatorë fiskalë. Kritikat e liberalëve për përpjekjen për rindërtim janë përqendruar te dhënia e kontratave të rindërtimit te personat e perceptuar se kanë lidhje të brendshme me Uashingtonin."
mt: The debate was sparked by controversies over spending on aid and rebuilding immediately after Hurricane Katrina, which have been labeled as the "Bush's Deal for New Orleans" by some fiscal conservatives. Liberal criticism of the rebuilding effort has focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to persons perceived to have inside connections with Washington.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Kur kapsula të mbërrijë në Tokë dhe të hyjë në atmosferë, rreth orës 5 p.d. (ora lindore), pritet të japë një shfaqje të vërtetë me drita për njerëzit në Kaliforninë e Veriut, Oregon, Nevadë dhe Utah. Kapsula do të ngjajë më tepër si yll që bie kur të përshkojë qiellin. Kapsula do të lëvizë me afro 12,8 km ose 8 milje për sekondë, një shpejtësi aq e madhe sa për ta përshkuar distancën nga San-Francisko në Los Anxheles për një minutë. ""Stardust"" do të vendosë një rekord të ri të gjithë kohëve si anija kozmike e kthyer më shpejt në tokë, duke thyer rekordin e mëparshëm në maj të vitit 1969 gjatë kthimit të modulit komandues të ""Apollo X"". ""Ajo do të fluturojë mbi bregun perëndimor të Kalifornisë së veriut dhe do të ndriçojë në qiell nga Kalifornia deri në Oregonin qendror dhe në vazhdim deri në Nevada, Idaho e Utah"", - u shpreh Tom Duxbury, menaxheri i projektit për Stardust."
mt: "When the capsule arrives on Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5 p.m. (local time), it is expected to give a real show with light to people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look more like a falling star when it crosses the sky. The capsule will move at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, a speed so great as to cover the distance from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. ""Stardust"" will set a new all-time record as the fastest returning space ship, breaking the previous record in May 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. ""It will fly over the western coast of Northern California and will light up in the sky from California to Central Oregon and then to Nevada, Idaho and Utah"", - said Tom Duxbury, project manager for Stardust."
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: "Një mjeke që punonte në Spitalin e Fëmijëve të Pitsburgut, Pensilvani do të akuzohet për vrasje të qëllimshme, pasi nëna e saj u gjend e vdekur të mërkurën në bagazhin e makinës së saj, deklaruan autoritetet në Ohajo. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29 vjeç, ishte gjetur në Blue Ash, Ohajo, në një zonë periferie rreth 15 milje në veri të Sinsinatit, e shtrirë në tokë buzë rrugës me një bluzë e të brendshme dhe dukshëm në një gjendje të rënduar shëndetësore. Ajo i udhëhoqi oficerët për te mjeti i saj ""Oldsmobile Intrigue"" që ndodhej 150 metra larg. Aty u gjet trupi i 53 vjeçares Saroja Balasubramanian, e mbuluar me një batanije të gjakosur. Policia tha se trupi dukej të ketë qenë atje për gati një ditë."
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, a pediatrician at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with murder after her mother was found dead on Monday in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati. She was found lying on the side of the road with a bloody sheet and appeared to be in a state of distress. She led officers to her "Oldsmobile Intrigue" which was parked 150 meters away. There, the body of 53-year-old Saroja Balasubramanian was found covered in blood. Police said the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Kjo konsiderohet blerja më e madhe në të gjithë historinë e eBay. Shoqëria shpreson që t'i diversifikojë burimet e fitimit dhe të fitojë popullaritet në zonat ku Skype ka pozitë të fortë, si p.sh. në Kinë, Evropën lindore dhe Brazil.
mt: This is the largest sale in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and gain popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Kur ndaluan përleshjet pasi personat e plagosur u dërguan në spital, rreth 40 të burgosur të tjerë qëndruan në oborr dhe nuk pranuan që të ktheheshin në qeli. Negociatorët u munduan ta rregullojnë situatën, por kërkesat e të burgosurve janë të paqarta. Midis 10:00-11:00 p.d. me orën verore të Maleve Shkëmbore, u ndez nga të burgosurit një zjarr në oborr. Shpejt, oficerët e pajisur me pararmatime të ndërhyrjes së shpejtë hynë në oborr dhe kufizuan lëvizjen e të burgosurve me gaz lotsjellës. Ekipet e zjarrfikësve e fikën përfundimisht zjarrin deri në 11:35 pasdite.
mt: 40 other inmates remained in the yard and refused to return to their cells after the fighting stopped and the injured were taken to the hospital. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands are unclear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 am local time, inmates lit a fire in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot control gear entered the yard and contained the inmates' movement with tear gas. Firefighters extinguished the fire by 11:35 am.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Komentet, drejtpërsëdrejti në televizion, ishin të parat nëpërmjet të cilave burimet e larta iraniane kanë pohuar që sanksionet kanë efekt. Ato përfshijnë kufizime financiare dhe embargon e BE-së ndaj eksportit të naftës bruto, që përbën 80% të të ardhurave nga jashtë në ekonominë iraniane. Në një raport të fundit mujor, OPEC-u u shpreh se eksportet e naftës bruto kishin rënë në 2,8 milionë fuçi në ditë, niveli më i ulët i këtyre dy dhjetëvjeçarëve. Lideri suprem i vendit, Ajatollah Ali Kamenei, e ka përshkruar varësinë ekonomike nga nafta si ""një kurth"" që daton para revolucionit islamik të Iranit në vitin 1979, nga i cili vendi duhet të çlirohet."
mt: "Comments, live on television, were the first through which Iranian high officials have claimed that sanctions have an effect. They include financial restrictions and the EU's embargo on crude oil exports, which makes up 80% of the country's foreign income. In a recent monthly report, OPEC said crude oil exports had fallen to 2.8 million barrels a day, the lowest level in these two decades. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the economic dependence on oil as a "trap" dating back before the Islamic Revolution of Iran in 1979, from which the country needs to be freed."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Votimi në Francë ka qenë tradicionalisht një eksperiencë e teknologjisë së ulët: votuesit vetizolohen në një kabinë dhe fusin në zarf një fletë letre të shtypur paraprakisht ku përcaktojnë kandidatin e zgjedhur. Pasi zyrtarët verifikojnë identitetin e votuesit, votuesi hedh zarfin në kutinë e votimit dhe nënshkruan listën e votimit. Ligji zgjedhor francez i përcakton në mënyrë të rreptë procedurat. Që prej vitit 1988, kutitë e votimit duhet të jenë të tejdukshme që votuesit dhe vëzhguesit të kenë mundësi të dëshmojnë se nuk ka asnjë zarf në to para nisjes së votimit dhe që të mos shtohet asnjë zarf përveç atyre të votuesve të numëruar e të autorizuar siç duhet. Kandidatët mund të dërgojnë përfaqësues si dëshmitarë të çdo pjese të procesit. Votat numërohen në mbrëmje nga vullnetarët nën kontroll të rreptë, duke zbatuar procedurat përkatëse.
mt: Voting in France has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters are isolated in a booth and drop a pre-printed ballot slip into a ballot box. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the ballot into the ballot box and signs the voting list. French electoral law specifies the procedure in detail. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can verify that no ballots are in them before voting begins and that no ballots are added except those of registered and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives as witnesses to any part of the process. Votes are counted by volunteers under strict control, following the appropriate procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: "Nëse konfirmohet, ky zbulim shënon përfundimin e kërkimit tetëvjeçar të Allen për Musashi. Anija e mbytur u gjet duke ndjekur hartën e fundit të detit dhe nëpërmjet përdorimit të mjetit nënujor me telekomandë (ROV). Një prej njerëzve më të pasur në botë, Aleni, thuhet se ka investuar pjesën më të madhe të pasurisë së tij në eksplorimin e detit dhe e filloi kërkimin e tij për gjetjen e ""Musashi"" nga interesi i përjetshëm për luftën."
mt: "If confirmed, this discovery marks the end of Allen's eight-year search for Musashi. The sunken ship was found following the last map of the sea and through the use of underwater vehicles with remote control (ROV). One of the richest people in the world, Allen, is said to have invested most of his wealth in exploring the sea and started his search for the ""Musashi"" from his lifelong interest in the war."
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Njoftimet televizive tregojnë për tymin e bardhë që del nga uzina. Autoritetet vendore po i këshillojnë banorët pranë uzinës të rrinë brenda, të fikin kondicionerët dhe të mos pinë ujë nga çezma. Sipas agjencisë bërthamore japoneze, në impiant janë identifikuar ceziumi dhe jodi radioaktiv. Autoritetet hamendësojnë se kjo tregon se kontejnerët që mbajnë lëndë djegëse me uranium në fabrikë mund të jenë çarë dhe po rrjedhin.
mt: Local television reports a white plume of smoke is coming from the plant. Local authorities are advising residents near the plant to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, cesium and iodine radioactivity has been detected at the plant. Authorities suspect this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel in the factory may have been breached and are leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dr. Tony Moll zbuloi tuberkulozin jashtëzakonisht rezistent ndaj barnave (XDR-TB) në rajonin KwaZulu-Natal të Afrikës së Jugut. Ai u shpreh në një intervistë se varianti i ri ishte ""shumë shqetësues dhe alarmues për arsye të përqindjes shumë të lartë të vdekshmërisë"". Disa pacientëve mund t'ju jetë ngjitur virusi në spital, - mendon dr. Molli, - dhe të paktën dy ishin punonjës shëndetësorë në spital. Brenda një viti, një i infektuar mund të infektojë 10 deri në 15 kontakte të afërta. Megjithatë, përqindja e XDR-TB në gjithë grupin e personave të prekur nga tuberkulozi duket se përsëri është e ulët; 6000 nga 330 000 persona në total të infektuar në çdo moment të dhënë në Afrikën e Jugut."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa. He expressed in an interview that the new variant was ""very alarming and alarming for the high mortality rate"". Some patients may have contracted the virus in the hospital, - Dr. Moll thinks, - and at least two were health workers in the hospital. Within a year, an infected person can infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people affected by tuberculosis seems to be low again; 6000 of the 330,000 people in total infected in South Africa at any given time."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen është një sistem që, sipas pretendimeve të FAA-së, do t'i lejojë aeroplanët të lëvizin në itinerare më të shkurtra dhe të kursejnë miliona galonë karburant çdo vit, si dhe të zvogëlojnë emetimet e karbonit. Ai përdor teknologji satelitore, në krahasim me teknologjinë e vjetër që bazohej te radarët tokësorë, për t'i lejuar kontrollorët e trafikut ajror ta lokalizojnë me më shumë saktësi avionin dhe t'u japin pilotëve informacione më të përpikta.
mt: NextGen is a system that, according to FAA's claims, will allow planes to fly on shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year, as well as reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite technology, in contrast to the old technology that was based on ground radars, to allow air traffic controllers to more accurately locate the plane and give pilots more precise information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Historianët i kanë kritikuar politikat e mëparshme të FBI-së për përqendrimin e burimeve në çështjet që zgjidhen me lehtësi, sidomos në çështjet e makinave të vjedhura, me qëllim rritjen e përqindjes së suksesit të agjencisë. Kongresi e nisi financimin e iniciativës për aktivitetet e pahijshme në vitin fiskal 2005 dhe specifikoi që FBI-ja duhet të caktonte 10 agjentë për pornografinë për të rriturit.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies of concentrating resources on cases that are easily solved, especially on stolen car cases, in order to increase the agency's success rate. Congress funded the initiative for unsolved activities in the fiscal year 2005 and specified that the FBI should assign 10 agents to pornography for the increase.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: """JAS 39C Gripen"" u rrëzua në një pistë rreth orës 9:30 p.d. me orën vendore (02:30 me orën universale të koordinuar) dhe shpërtheu, duke shkaktuar mbylljen e aeroportit për fluturimet tregtare. Piloti u identifikua si drejtuesi i skuadriljes, Dilokrit Patave. Media vendëse njofton se një automjet zjarrfikës i aeroportit u përmbys gjatë reagimit."
mt: 39C Gripen crashed on a runway around 9:30 p.m. local time (02:30 UTC) and exploded, causing the airport to close to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader, Dilokrit Patave. Local media reports that an airport fire truck was overturned during the response.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: """JAS 39C Gripen"" u rrëzua në një pistë rreth orës 9:30 p.d. me orën vendore (02:30 me orën universale të koordinuar) dhe shpërtheu, duke shkaktuar mbylljen e aeroportit për fluturimet tregtare. Piloti u identifikua si drejtuesi i skuadriljes, Dilokrit Patave. Media vendëse njofton se një automjet zjarrfikës i aeroportit u përmbys gjatë reagimit."
mt: 39C Gripen crashed on a runway around 9:30 p.m. local time (02:30 UTC) and exploded, causing the airport to close to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as squadron leader, Dilokrit Patave. Local media reports that an airport fire truck was overturned during the response.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Gjatë gjithë viteve 1960, Bërzezinski punoi për Xhon F. Kenedin si këshilltar i tij e më pas, në administratën e Lindon B. Xhonsonit. Në zgjedhjet e vitit 1976, ai këshilloi Karterin për politikën e jashtme e më pas, shërbeu si Këshilltar i Sigurisë Kombëtare (KSK) nga viti 1977 deri në 1981, duke pasuar Henri Kisingerin. Si këshilltar kombëtar për sigurinë, ai e ndihmoi presidentin Carter në trajtimin diplomatik të çështjeve ndërkombëtare, si Marrëveshjet e Kampit Dejvid, 1978, normalizimin e marrëdhënieve SHBA-Kinë deri në fund të viteve 1970; Revolucionin Iranian që solli krizën e pengjeve në Iran në 1979; si dhe pushtimin sovjetik në Afganistan në 1979.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his foreign policy advisor and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy and later served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As national security advisor, he helped President Carter in the diplomatic handling of international issues, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978, normalization of U.S.–China relations until the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: "I lindur në kryeqytetin e Kroacisë, Zagreb, Bobeku u bë i famshëm kur luante për Partizanin e Beogradit. Ai iu bashkua atyre në vitin 1945 dhe qëndroi deri në vitin 1958. Ai shënoi 403 gola në 468 paraqitje gjatë pjesëmarrjes së tij në ekip. Asnjë tjetër nuk ka marrë pjesë në më shumë ndeshje apo shënuar më shumë gola për klubin se Bobek. Ai u votua në vitin 1995 si lojtari më i mirë në historinë e ""Partizanit""."
mt: Born in the capital of Croatia, Zagreb, Bobek became famous when playing for Partizan of Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. He scored 403 goals in 468 appearances during his time with the team. No other player has taken part in more matches or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. He was voted in 1995 as the best player in the history of "Partizan".
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae është një specie që i përket familjes Dromaeosauridae dhe është kushëri i velociraptorit. Ky zog grabitqar gjakngrohtë, i mbuluar krejtësisht me pendë, mendohej se kishte ecur drejt mbi dy këmbë me kthetra si gjinia Velociraptor. Kthetra e tij e dytë ishte më e madhe, duke i dhënë emrin hesperonikus, që do të thotë ""kthetra perëndimore""."
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species belonging to the family Dromaeosauridae and is a relative of velociraptor. This blood-sucking, feathered bird, thought to have walked on two legs with a tail like the genus Velociraptor, had a second tail that was larger, giving it the name hesperonychus, which means "western claw."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Në festë kishin marrë pjesë të paktën 100 vetë për të festuar përvjetorin e parë të një çifti, i cili kishte bërë dasmën vitin e shkuar. Një aktivitet zyrtar përvjetori u planifikua për një datë të mëvonshme, - thanë zyrtarët. Çifti ishte martuar vitin e kaluar në Teksas dhe erdhi në Bufalo për të festuar me shokët dhe kushërinjtë. Burri 30-vjeçar, i lindur në Buffalo, ishte një ndër katër personat e vrarë nga të shtënat, por gruaja e tij s'ishte lënduar.
mt: 100 or more people had gathered to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple, who had gotten married last year. A formal anniversary celebration was planned for a later date, officials said. The couple was married last year in Texas and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, born in Buffalo, was one of four people killed by the explosions, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno kishte brenda 120-160 metra kub karburant kur u prish dhe erërat e forta dhe dallgët e shtynë në dallgëpritëse. Helikopterët i shpëtuan të dymbëdhjetë pjesëtarët e ekuipazhit me vetëm një dëmtim, një thyerje hunde. Anija 100-metërshe po shkonte të merrte ngarkesën e saj të zakonshme të plehut dhe zyrtarët u frikësuan në fillim se mos anija derdhte një ngarkesë.
mt: 120-160 cubic metres of fuel was inside the plane when it broke up and strong winds and waves pushed it onto the breakwaters. Helicopters rescued the twelve crew members with only one injury, a broken hand. The 100-metre ship was going to take its usual load of sand and officials were initially concerned that the ship was leaking a load.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Arritjet e Vautierit, jashtë punës së tij si regjisor, përfshijnë një grevë urie në vitin 1973 kundër asaj që, sipas tij, ishte një censurë politike. Ligji francez u ndryshua. Aktivizmi i tij i kishte fillesat në moshën 15-vjeçare kur iu bashkua Rezistencës Franceze gjatë Luftës II Botërore. Ai e dokumentoi këtë vetë në një libër të botuar në vitin 1998. Në vitet 1960, ai u kthye në Algjerinë që sapo kishte fituar pavarësinë për të dhënë mësim për Regji filmi.
mt: Vautier's achievements, outside of his work as a director, include a hunger strike in 1973 against what, in his view, was a political censorship. The French law was changed. His activism had its roots at age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented this in a book published in 1998. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Mbi katër milionë persona shkuan në Romë për të marrë pjesë në funeral. Numri i pjesëmarrësve ishte aq i madh, sa s'ishte e mundur që të gjithë të mund të ndiqnin funeralin në Sheshin e Shën Pjetrit. Disa ekrane të mëdha televizori u vendosën në disa vende në Romë për t'u mundësuar njerëzve teleshikimin e ceremonisë. Në shumë qytete të tjera të Italisë e në pjesën tjetër të botës, veçanërisht në Poloni, u bënë organizime të ngjashme që u panë nga një numër goxha i madh njerëzish.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of attendees was so large that it was not possible for everyone to follow the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Large TV screens were set up in several places in Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony. Similar arrangements were made in many other Italian cities and in other parts of the world, especially in Poland, where a large number of people were seen.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: "Sipas njoftimeve, një apartament shpërtheu në rrugën ""Makbeth"" për shkak të një rrjedhjeje gazi. Një zyrtar i shoqërisë së gazit po njoftonte në vendngjarje pasi një fqinj telefonoi për një rrjedhje gazi. Banesa shpërtheu kur mbërriti nëpunësi publik. Nuk u raportua asnjë lëndim madhor, por të paktën pesë persona që ishin në vendngjarje në momentin e shpërthimit u mjekuan për simptomat e shokut. Në apartament nuk kishte njeri. Në atë kohë, nga zona u evakuuan afërsisht 100 banorë."
mt: "According to reports, an apartment exploded on the "Macbeth" street due to a gas leak. A gas company official was reporting at the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. The house exploded when the public official arrived. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people who were at the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms. No one was in the apartment. At that time, about 100 residents were evacuated from the area."
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Viktimat ishin Zachary Cuddeback, 21 vjeç dhe Nicholas Alden, 25 vjeç. Cuddeback kishte qenë shoferi i makinës. Edgar Veguilla u plagos në krah dhe në nofull, kurse Kristoffer Schneider pësoi plagë që kërkuan kirurgji për rindërtimin e fytyrës së tij. Arma e Ukës u bllokua kur e drejtoi në kokën e personit të pestë. Schneider ka dhimbje të vazhdueshme, është verbuar nga një sy, i mungon një pjesë e kafkës dhe fytyra i është rindërtuar me titan. Shneideri dëshmoi nëpërmjet një lidhjeje me video nga një bazë e FA-së së SHBA-së në atdheun e tij.
mt: 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback and 25-year-old Nicholas Alden were killed. Cuddeback was the driver of the car. Edgar Veguilla was injured in the jaw and nose, while Kristoffer Schneider suffered injuries that required facial reconstruction surgery. The gun of the UK was blocked when he aimed it at the fifth person. Schneider has ongoing pain, is blind in one eye, has a missing piece of his skull, and his face has been reconstructed with titanium. Schneider testified via a video link from a US Air Force base in his homeland.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Si golfi, ashtu edhe regbi do të bëhen përsëri pjesë e Lojërave Olimpike. Komiteti Olimpik Ndërkombëtar votoi sot për përfshirjen e sporteve në mbledhjen e bordit ekzekutiv në Berlin. Regbi, në mënyrë specifike regbi i unionit, dhe golfi u zgjodhën nga pesë sporte të tjera të marrë në konsideratë për pjesëmarrjen në Lojërat Olimpike. Skuashi, karateja dhe sportet me patina u përpoqën të bëheshin pjesë e disiplinave sportive olimpike, sikurse edhe bejsbolli me softbollin, që ishin hequr nga Lojërat Olimpike të 2005-sës. Megjithatë, votimi duhet miratuar nga Komiteti Olimpik Ndërkombëtar i plotë në mbledhjen e tij në tetor në Kopenhagë.
mt: Golf and rugby will be back in the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted today for the inclusion of sports in the board meeting in Berlin. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were chosen from five other sports considered for participation in the Olympic Games. Skuashi, karate and sports with patina were attempted to be part of the Olympic sports disciplines, as well as baseball and softball, which were removed from the 2005 Olympic Games. However, the vote must be approved by the International Olympic Committee in full in its meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Si golfi, ashtu edhe regbi do të bëhen përsëri pjesë e Lojërave Olimpike. Komiteti Olimpik Ndërkombëtar votoi sot për përfshirjen e sporteve në mbledhjen e bordit ekzekutiv në Berlin. Regbi, në mënyrë specifike regbi i unionit, dhe golfi u zgjodhën nga pesë sporte të tjera të marrë në konsideratë për pjesëmarrjen në Lojërat Olimpike. Skuashi, karateja dhe sportet me patina u përpoqën të bëheshin pjesë e disiplinave sportive olimpike, sikurse edhe bejsbolli me softbollin, që ishin hequr nga Lojërat Olimpike të 2005-sës. Megjithatë, votimi duhet miratuar nga Komiteti Olimpik Ndërkombëtar i plotë në mbledhjen e tij në tetor në Kopenhagë.
mt: Golf and rugby will be back in the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted today for the inclusion of sports in the board meeting in Berlin. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were chosen from five other sports considered for participation in the Olympic Games. Skuashi, karate and sports with patina were attempted to be part of the Olympic sports disciplines, as well as baseball and softball, which were removed from the 2005 Olympic Games. However, the vote must be approved by the International Olympic Committee in full in its meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: "Në datën 24 shtator 1759, Arthur Guinness nënshkroi qiranë për 9000 vite për kantinën e birrës St James' Gate në qytetin e Dublinit në Irlandë. 250 vite më pas, ""Guinness"" është shndërruar në një biznes botëror që fiton 10 miliardë euro (14,7 miliardë dollarë amerikanë) në vit."
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9000 year lease for the St James' Gate brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, "Guinness" has become a global business earning 10 billion euros (14.7 billion U.S. dollars) a year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Konfirmohet se tipi i gripit të shpendëve H5N1, i cili është vdekjeprurës për njerëzit, ka prekur një rosë të egër, e gjetur e ngordhur ditën e hënë në një moçal në afërsi të Lionit në pjesën lindore të Francës. Franca është vendi i shtatë i Bashkimit Evropian që po vuan nga ky virus, pas Austrisë, Gjermanisë, Sllovenisë, Bullgarisë, Greqisë dhe Italisë. Rastet e dyshuara të virusit H5N1 të shfaqura në Danimarkë dhe Kroaci nuk janë konfirmuar ende.
mt: It is confirmed that the type of bird flu H5N1, which is fatal to humans, has affected a wild goose, found and frozen on Monday in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer from this virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. The suspected cases of the H5N1 virus in Denmark and Croatia have not yet been confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Paqeruajtësit e Kombeve të Bashkuara që erdhën në Haiti pas tërmetit të vitit 2010, po fajësohen për përhapjen e sëmundjes që nisi pranë vendfushimit të trupave. Sipas padisë, mbetjet nga kampi i Kombeve të Bashkuara nuk ishin pastruar si duhet, duke bërë që bakteret të kalonin në degën e lumit Artibonite, një nga lumenjtë më të mëdhenj të Haitit. Para ardhjes së trupave, Haiti nuk kishte ndeshur probleme me sëmundjen që prej viteve 1800. Instituti për Drejtësi e Demokraci i Haitit ka përmendur studimet e pavarura që sugjerojnë se batalioni paqeruajtës nepalez i Kombeve të Bashkuara solli sëmundjen në Haiti pa dijeninë e tij. Danielle Lantagne, një ekspert i Kombeve të Bashkuara për sëmundjen, deklaroi se shpërthimi i epidemisë mund të jetë shkaktuar nga trupat paqeruajtëse.
mt: UN peacekeepers who came to Haiti after the 2010 earthquake are being blamed for the spread of the disease that started near the peacekeepers' camp. According to the lawsuit, the remains from the UN camp were not cleaned up properly, allowing bacteria to pass into the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before the arrival of the peacekeepers, Haiti had not encountered the disease since the 1800s. The Institute for Justice and Democracy in Haiti has mentioned independent studies that suggest that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion brought the disease to Haiti without its knowledge. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, declared that the epidemic's outbreak could have been caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Qeveria irlandeze po vë theksin tek urgjenca e korrigjimit të gjendjes përmes legjislacionit parlamentar. ""Tani ka shumë rëndësi, si në këndvështrimin e shëndetit publik, ashtu edhe në atë të së drejtës penale, që legjislacioni të miratohet sa më shpejt që të jetë e mundur"", - tha një zëdhënës i qeverisë. Ministri i Shëndetësisë shprehu shqetësimin për mirëqenien e personave që shfrytëzojnë ligjshmërinë e përkohshme të substancave në fjalë, si dhe për dënimet për drogat nga hyrja në fuqi e ndryshimeve që tani konsiderohen antikushtetuese."
mt: "The Irish government is emphasising the urgency of correcting the situation through parliamentary legislation. "It is now very important, both in terms of public health and criminal law, that legislation be passed as soon as possible," a government spokesman said. The Minister for Health expressed concern for the well-being of people who are taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances in question, as well as for the penalties for drugs from the entry into force of changes that are now considered unconstitutional."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Christopher Garcia, zëdhënës i Departamentit të Policisë së Los Anxhelesit, tha se i dyshuari po hetohet për cenimin e pronës dhe jo për vandalizëm. Shenja nuk ishte dëmtuar fizikisht; ndryshimi ishte bërë me mushama të zeza të stolisura me shenjën e paqes dhe të zemrës për të ndryshuar ""O""-në që të lexohej si shkronja ""e"" e vogël."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect is being investigated for property damage and not vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the change was made with black spray-painted peace and heart symbols to change the "O" to read as the lowercase letter "e"."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "Karno është një mësues privat i shquar, por i diskutueshëm, që dha mësim në ""Modern Education and King's Glory"", i cili deklaroi se kishte 9000 nxënës në kulmin e karrierës së tij. Ai përdorte në shënimet e tij fjalë që disa prindër i konsideronin të ashpra dhe thuhet se përdorte sharje në klasë. ""Modern Education"" e akuzoi atë se kishte printuar pa autorizim reklama të mëdha në autobusë dhe se kishte gënjyer duke thënë se ishte mësuesi kryesor privat i anglishtes. Ai është akuzuar edhe më parë për shkelje të të drejtave të autorit, por nuk janë ngritur padi. Një ish-student tha që ai ""përdorte fjalë rruge në klasë, jepte pusulla me udhezime për takime dashurie dhe sillej si ""shoku"" i studentëve."
mt: "Karno is a well-known but controversial private tutor who taught at ""Modern Education and King's Glory"", who declared that he had 9000 pupils at the peak of his career. He used in his notes words that some parents considered harsh and it is said that he used taunts in class. ""Modern Education"" accused him of printing unauthorized large advertisements on buses and of lying by saying that he was the main private tutor of English. He has also been accused earlier for copyright infringement, but no charges have been brought. A former student said that he ""used street language in class, gave out slips of paper with dating advice and behaved like a ""friend"" of the students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Një ish-polic filipinas ka mbajtur peng turistë nga Hong-Kongu përmes rrëmbimit të autobusit të tyre në Manila, kryeqytetin e Filipineve. Rolando Mendoza shkrepi pushkën e tij M16 në drejtim të turistëve. Janë shpëtuar disa pengje dhe të paktën gjashtë janë konfirmuar deri tani të vdekur. Gjashtë pengje, përfshi fëmijët e të moshuarit, u liruan të parët, ashtu si dhe fotografët filipinas. Fotografët zunë më vonë vendin e një të moshuare pasi ajo duhej të shkonte në banjë. Mendozën e qëlluan me armë.
mt: A former Philippine policeman has held tourists from Hong Kong hostage by taking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been freed and at least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including children and the elderly, were released first, as well as Filipino photographers. The photographers took the place of an elderly woman after she had to go to the bathroom. Mendoza shot her with a gun.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazili është vendi më i madh katolik roman në Tokë dhe Kisha Katolike Romane e ka kundërshtuar vazhdimisht ligjësimin e martesave midis personave të të njëjtës gjini në këtë shtet. Kongresi Kombëtar i Brazilit ka debatuar për 10 vjet mbi legalizimin dhe këto martesa civile janë aktualisht të ligjshme vetëm në Rio-Grande-do-Sul. Projektligji fillestar u hartua nga ish-kryebashkiakja e Sao-Paolos, Marta Suplici. Legjislacioni i propozuar, pasi u ndryshua, është tani në duart e Roberto Xhefersonit. Protestuesit shpresojnë të mbledhin 1,2 milionë firma për një peticion i cili do t'i paraqitet në nëntor Kongresit Kombëtar.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the teaching of marriages between persons of the same sex in this state. The National Congress of Brazil has debated for 10 years on the legalization and these civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of Sao Paulo, Marta Suplici. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures for a petition which will be presented to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Pesë minuta pasi shfaqet, një erë fillon të fryjë e gati një minutë më pas, era arrin 70 km/h... më pas, vjen shiu, por aq i fortë dhe aq i madh sa të godet në lëkurë si gjilpërë, më pas ra breshër nga qielli, njerëzit në panik dhe duke ulëritur e duke shkelur njëri-tjetrin. ""Humba motrën time dhe shoqen e saj dhe gjatë rrugës për atje, kishte dy persona me aftësi të kufizuara në karrige me rrota, njerëzit që thjesht kërcenin dhe i shtynin ata"", - tha Armand Versace."
mt: 5 minutes after it appears, a wind starts to blow almost a minute later, the wind reaches 70 km/h... then, it rains, but so hard and so big that it hits like hail, then it came from the sky, people in panic and screaming and stepping on each other. "Humba my sister and her friend and on the way there, there were two people with limited abilities in the carriage with wheels, people who were just spinning and pushing them", - said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: "Pesë minuta pasi shfaqet, një erë fillon të fryjë e gati një minutë më pas, era arrin 70 km/h... më pas, vjen shiu, por aq i fortë dhe aq i madh sa të godet në lëkurë si gjilpërë, më pas ra breshër nga qielli, njerëzit në panik dhe duke ulëritur e duke shkelur njëri-tjetrin. ""Humba motrën time dhe shoqen e saj dhe gjatë rrugës për atje, kishte dy persona me aftësi të kufizuara në karrige me rrota, njerëzit që thjesht kërcenin dhe i shtynin ata"", - tha Armand Versace."
mt: 5 minutes after it appears, a wind starts to blow almost a minute later, the wind reaches 70 km/h... then, it rains, but so hard and so big that it hits like hail, then it came from the sky, people in panic and screaming and stepping on each other. "Humba my sister and her friend and on the way there, there were two people with limited abilities in the carriage with wheels, people who were just spinning and pushing them", - said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: "Parashikuesit e motit thonë se stuhia, e cila ndodhet rreth 645 milje (1040 km) në perëndim të ishujve të Kepit Verde, mund të davaritet para se të afrohet në zonat tokësore. Fredi ka aktualisht erëra me 105 milje në orë (165 km/h) dhe po zhvendoset në drejtim të veriperëndimit. Deri tani, ""Fred"" është cikloni më i fuqishëm tropikal i regjistruar ndonjëherë në jug dhe në lindje të Atlantikut që prej mbërritjes së imazheve satelitore dhe i treti prej uraganëve të mëdhenj të regjistruar në lindje të meridianit 35° në perëndim."
mt: "Weather forecasters say the storm, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, could intensify before it reaches land areas. Fred has winds of 105 mph (165 km/h) and is moving west-northwest. So far, "Fred" is the most intense tropical cyclone ever recorded in the southern and eastern Atlantic since satellite imagery began and the third major hurricane ever recorded east of longitude 35° west.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Standardi 802.11n operon në të dyja frekuencat 2,4 Ghz dhe 5,0 Ghz. Kjo do ta lejojë atë që të jetë në mënyrë retroaktive në përputhje me 802.11a, 802.11b dhe 802.11g, me kusht që stacioni bazë të ketë dy radio. Shpejtësitë e 802.11n janë shumë më të mëdha se ajo e paraardhësve të tij, me një shpejtësi teorikisht maksimale prej 600 Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n operates on both the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies. This will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has two radios. 802.11n speeds are much faster than its predecessors, with a theoretically maximum speed of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Fituesi i medaljes së artë olimpike duhej të notonte në 100 dhe 200 metra stil i lirë e në tri stafeta në Lojërat e Komonuelthit, por për arsye të ankimeve të tij, forma e tij fizike nuk ka qenë e sigurt. Ai nuk ka mundur të marrë barnat e duhur për të mposhtur dhimbjen e tij, pasi ato ndalohen nga Lojërat.
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist swimmer had to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle and three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but for reasons of his complaints, his physical form has not been safe. He has not been able to take the necessary drugs to overcome his pain, as they are banned from the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Harta ndërkombëtare e tërmeteve e Shërbimit Gjeologjik të SHBA-së nuk shfaqi tërmete në Islandë një javë më parë. Zyra Meteorologjike e Islandës nuk njoftoi gjithashtu për asnjë aktivitet tërmetesh në rajonin e Heklas në 48 orët e kaluara. Aktiviteti i madh i tërmetit që shkaktoi ndryshimin e fazës kishte ndodhur më 10 mars në anën verilindore të kalderës së majës së vullkanit. Në rrëzë të malit, u njoftua për re të errëta që nuk lidheshin me ndonjë aktivitet vullkanik. Retë paraqitën mundësinë e paqartësisë lidhur me mundësinë e ndodhjes së një shpërthimi të vërtetë.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's international earthquake map did not show earthquakes in Iceland a week earlier. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also did not report any volcanic activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. The major earthquake activity that caused the phase change had occurred on March 10 on the northwestern slope of the volcano. In the foothills, it was reported for dark clouds that were not related to any volcanic activity. The clouds raised the possibility of uncertainty related to the possibility of the presence of a real explosion.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Anija orbitale hënore pa pilot Chandrayaan-1 lëshoi Sondën (MIP), e cila u nis drejt sipërfaqes së Hënës me 1,5 kilometra në sekondë (3000 milje në orë) dhe kreu me sukses një ulje emergjente në afërsi të polit jugor të Hënës. Përveç tre instrumenteve të rëndësishme shkencore, sonda hënore mbante të pikturuar në çdo anë të sajën edhe figurën e flamurit kombëtar indian.
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter spacecraft released the MIP, which was launched towards the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) and successfully performed an emergency descent near the lunar south pole. In addition to three important scientific instruments, the lunar orbiter carried the national flag of India painted on every side of it.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Këtë sezon, rastet e para të sëmundjes u raportuan në fund të korrikut. Derrat janë bartësit e sëmundjes, e cila migron më pas te njerëzit përmes mushkonjave. Shpërthimi e ka shtyrë qeverinë indiane të marrë masa të tilla, si: vendosja e leqeve të derrave në zonat e prekura rëndë, shpërndarja e mijëra perdeve për mushkonja dhe spërkatja me pesticide. Qeveria ka premtuar po ashtu disa milionë flakonë të vaksinës anti-encefalit, e cila do të ndihmojë që agjencitë shëndetësore të parapërgatiten për vitin pasardhës. Planet për shpërndarjen e vaksinave në zonat historikisht më të prekura u vonuan këtë vit, për shkak se mungonin fondet dhe se iu dha më pak përparësi në krahasim me sëmundjet e tjera.
mt: This season, the first cases were reported in late July. Deer are the carriers of the disease, which then migrates to humans through mosquitoes. The explosion has prompted the Indian government to take measures such as: placing deer fences in heavily affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. The government has also promised millions of doses of anti-encephalitis vaccine, which will help health agencies prepare for next year. Plans to distribute the vaccine in historically most affected areas were delayed this year, due to lack of funds and less priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Amendamenti i propozuar e ka marrë miratimin e të dyja dhomave që në 2011-tën. Në këtë seancë plenare pati një rishqyrtim, fjalia e dytë e hedhur fillimisht poshtë nga Dhoma e Përfaqësueve, u miratua nga Senati ditën e hënë në një formë të ngjashme. Hedhja poshtë e fjalisë së dytë, e cila propozon ndalimin e martesave civile mes personave të së njëjtës gjini, mund të hapë derën për martesat civile në të ardhmen. Rezoluta e Përbashkët e të dy Dhomave do të rishikohet sërish pas procesit nga legjislatura pasardhëse e zgjedhur në vitin 2015 ose 2016 që të vazhdojë të jetë në proces.
mt: 2011 amendments have been approved by both houses. In this plenary session there was a review, the second paragraph thrown down initially by the House of Representatives, was approved by the Senate on Monday in a similar form. The second paragraph, which proposes the ban on civil marriages between persons of the same sex, could open the door for civil marriages in the future. The Joint Resolution of both Houses will be reviewed again after the process of the next legislature elected in 2015 or 2016 to continue to be in process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Panama Papers"" është një term gjithëpërfshirës për rreth dhjetë milionë dokumente të publikuara nga zyra e avokatisë panameze Mossack Fonseca në pranverën e 2016-s. Në dokumente tregohet se katërmbëdhjetë banka ndihmuan klientët e tyre të pasur që të fshihnin pasuri me vlerë miliarda dollarë amerikanë për t'ju shmangur taksave dhe kuadreve të tjera rregullatore. Gazeta britanike The Guardian sugjeronte se Deutsche Bank kontrollonte afro një të tretën e 1200 shoqërive fiktive të përdorura në arritjen e këtij qëllimi. Pati protesta në mbarë botën, disa procedime penale dhe të dy krerët e qeverive të Islandës dhe Pakistanit u dorëhoqën."
mt: The Panama Papers is a term encompassing a leak of 11.5 million confidential documents released by the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca in April 2016. The documents show that 12 banks helped their clients to hide their wealth from tax authorities and other regulatory bodies. The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of 1200 fictitious companies used to achieve this goal. There were protests around the world, some legal proceedings, and both the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."
