src: Aksidentet ajrore ndodhin rëndom në Iran, i cili ka një flotë të vjetër dhe pak të mirëmbajtur, qoftë për operacionet civile, ashtu edhe për ato ushtarake. Sanksionet ndërkombëtare kanë ndikuar në mosblerjen e aeroplanëve të rinj. Në fillim të kësaj jave, rrëzimi i një helikopteri të policisë shkaktoi vdekjen e tre personave dhe plagosjen e tre të tjerëve. Muajin e shkuar, Irani pa katastrofën e tij më të rëndë ajrore prej vitesh kur një aeroplan i drejtuar drejt Armenisë u rrëzua, duke ju marrë jetën 168 pasagjerëve të tij. Po atë muaj, një aeroplan tjetër i linjës kapërceu një pistë në Mashad dhe goditi një mur, duke vrarë shtatëmbëdhjetë persona.
mt: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging and poorly maintained fleet, whether for civilian or military operations. Sanctions have affected the lack of new aircraft. Last week, the crash of a police helicopter killed three people and injured three others. Last month, Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years when a passenger plane bound for Armenia crashed, killing all 168 of its passengers. The same month, another airliner overshot a runway in Mashad and hit a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Aksidentet ajrore ndodhin rëndom në Iran, i cili ka një flotë të vjetër dhe pak të mirëmbajtur, qoftë për operacionet civile, ashtu edhe për ato ushtarake. Sanksionet ndërkombëtare kanë ndikuar në mosblerjen e aeroplanëve të rinj. Në fillim të kësaj jave, rrëzimi i një helikopteri të policisë shkaktoi vdekjen e tre personave dhe plagosjen e tre të tjerëve. Muajin e shkuar, Irani pa katastrofën e tij më të rëndë ajrore prej vitesh kur një aeroplan i drejtuar drejt Armenisë u rrëzua, duke ju marrë jetën 168 pasagjerëve të tij. Po atë muaj, një aeroplan tjetër i linjës kapërceu një pistë në Mashad dhe goditi një mur, duke vrarë shtatëmbëdhjetë persona.
mt: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging and poorly maintained fleet, whether for civilian or military operations. Sanctions have affected the lack of new aircraft. Last week, the crash of a police helicopter killed three people and injured three others. Last month, Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years when a passenger plane bound for Armenia crashed, killing all 168 of its passengers. The same month, another airliner overshot a runway in Mashad and hit a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Grupi i studimit mbi Irakun paraqiti raportin e tij sot në 12:00 me orën GMT (ora mesatare e Grinuiçit). Ai paralajmëron që asnjë nuk mund të garantojë se cilido kurs veprimi në Irak në këtë moment do të ndalojë konfliktet mes sekteve, dhunën në rritje ose një përshpejtim të kaosit. Raporti fillon me lutjen për një debat të hapur dhe arritjen e një konsensusi në SHBA për politikën ndaj Lindjes së Mesme. Raporti është tej mase kritik për thuajse çdo aspekt të politikës aktuale ndaj Irakut nga ana e pushtetit ekzekutiv dhe kërkohet një ndryshim i menjëhershëm në këtë drejtim. I pari ndër 78 rekomandimet e tij është se duhet të ndërmerret një iniciativë e re diplomatike përpara fundit të këtij viti për sigurimin e kufijve të Irakut nga ndërhyrjet armiqësore, si dhe për të rivendosur marrëdhëniet diplomatike me fqinjët e tij.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian violence, rising chaos or a further acceleration of the chaos. The report begins with a prayer for an open debate and the achievement of a consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East. The report is almost entirely critical of almost every aspect of current policy towards Iraq by the executive branch and calls for an immediate change in this direction. The first of its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative be undertaken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders from hostile incursions, as well as to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Sipas agjencisë ""Ansa"", ""policia u shqetësua nga dy goditje të nivelit të lartë për të cilat kishte frikë se mund të ndiznin një luftë të vërtetë për trashëgiminë."" Policia tha se Lo Piccolo kishte fjalën e fundit, sepse ai kishte qenë krahu i djathtë i Provenzanos në Palermo dhe eksperienca e tij e konsiderueshme i kishte siguruar respektin e bosëve të brezit të vjetër kur ndoqën politikën e Provenzanos për të qëndruar sa më në hije, ndërkohë që forconin rrjetin e tyre të pushtetit. Këta bosë të mafias u frenuan nga Provenzano kur ai i dha fund luftës së udhëhequr nga Riina me shtetin, ku humbën jetën flamurtarë të luftës kundër mafias, Giovanni Falcone dhe Paolo Borsellino, në vitin 1992""."
mt: "According to the agency "Ansa", "the police were concerned by two high-level shots for which they feared they could ignite a real war for the inheritance." The police said that Lo Piccolo had the last word, because he had been the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo and his considerable experience had ensured the respect of the bosses of the old generation when they followed Provenzano's policy to stay as close as possible, while strengthening their power network. These mafia bosses were restrained by Provenzano when he ended the war led by Riina with the state, where they lost the lives of war heroes against the mafia, Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino, in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Xhudisti japonez Hitoshi Saito, fitues i dy medaljeve të arta olimpike, vdiq në moshën 54 vjeç. Sipas njoftimit, shkaku i vdekjes ishte kanceri intrahepatik i kanaleve biliare. Ai vdiq ditën e martë në Osaka. Saito, gjithashtu ish-kampion olimpik e botëror, ishte kryetari i komitetit të trajnimit të Federatës së Xhudos për Gjithë Japoninë në momentin që vdiq.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoist Hitoshi Saito, an Olympic gold medalist, died. The cause of death was intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma. He died on Monday in Osaka. Saito, also an Olympic and world champion, was the chairman of the training committee of the All Japan Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Iuasaki u ndodh shpesh në vështirësi gjatë udhëtimit të tij. Ai u plaçkit nga piratët, u sulmua në Tibet nga një qen i tërbuar, shpëtoi nga martesa në Nepal dhe u arrestua në Indi.
mt: He often found himself in trouble during his travels. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Xhankarlo Fizikela humbi kontrollin e makinës së tij dhe e mbylli garën pak pas nisjes. Shoku i tij i skuadrës, Fernando Alonso, qëndroi në kryesim gjatë pjesës më të madhe të garës, por e mbylli atë menjëherë pas hyrjes në bokse, ndoshta për shkak të një rrote të përparme të djathtë të kapur keq. Michael Schumacher e mbylli garën jo shumë kohë pas Alonsos, për shkak të dëmtimit të amortizatorëve gjatë betejave të shumta të garës.
mt: 2005 Formula One World Championship leader Jarno Trulli lost control of his car and crashed out of the race shortly after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but crashed out immediately after entering the pits, possibly due to a misfiring right front spark plug. Michael Schumacher retired not long after Alonso, due to front suspension damage sustained in several early-race collisions.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Gjatë 3 muajve të fundit, mbi 80 të arrestuar u liruan nga Qendra e Regjistrimit Qendror pa u akuzuar zyrtarisht. Në prill të këtij viti, një urdhër i përkohshëm ndalimi u lëshua nga gjykatësi Glynn kundër institucionit për të liruar ata që mbaheshin për më shumë se 24 orë pas arrestimit dhe që nuk kishin pasur një seancë dëgjimore nga një komisioner i gjykatës. Komisioneri cakton garancinë, nëse pranohet, dhe zyrtarizon akuzat e ngritura nga oficeri që ka kryer arrestimin. Më pas, akuzat regjistrohen në sistemin kompjuterik shtetëror ku monitorohet çështja. Seanca dëgjimore shënon po ashtu datën për të drejtën e të dyshuarit për një gjykim të shpejtë.
mt: 80+ people arrested in the last 3 months have been released from the Central Registry without being officially charged. In April of this year, a temporary restraining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the institution to release those held for more than 24 hours after arrest and who had not had a hearing from a commissioner of the court. The commissioner sets the guarantee, if accepted, and charges brought by the officer who made the arrest are then registered in the state's computer system where the case is monitored. Hearings also set the date for the defendant's right to a speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin tha gjithashtu se zyrtarët vendosën ta anulonin balotazhin për të shmangur shpenzimet dhe rreziqet e sigurisë të një palë zgjedhjesh të tjera për afganët. Diplomatët u shprehën se kishin gjetur dykuptimësi të mjaftueshme në kushtetutën e Afganistanit, gjë që i kishte shtyrë të vendosnin se balotazhi ishte i panevojshëm. Kjo është në kundërshtim me raportet e mëparshme, ku thuhej se një anulim i balotazhit nuk do të shkelte kushtetutën.
mt: Lodin said officials decided to cancel the election to avoid costs and security risks of a second vote for Afghans. Diplomats expressed that they had found sufficient sufficiency in the constitution of Afghanistan, which had prompted them to decide that the election was unnecessary. This is in contrast to previous reports, which said that the cancellation of the election would not violate the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Që nga pavarësia e Pakistanit nga sundimi britanik në vitin 1947, Presidenti pakistanez ka caktuar ""agjentë politikë"" për të drejtuar FATA-n, të cilët kanë një kontroll thuajse të plotë autonom mbi zonat. Këta agjentë janë ngarkuar që të ofrojnë shërbime shtetërore dhe ligjore sipas nenit 247 të Kushtetutës së Pakistanit."
mt: "Since the independence of Pakistan from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to govern the FATA, who have near total autonomous control over the region. These agents are tasked with providing state and legal services according to Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: "Ky film, me aktorët Emma Stone dhe Ryan Gosling, u nominua për të gjitha kategoritë kryesore. Goslingu dhe Stouni u nominuan përkatësisht si aktori dhe aktorja më e mirë. Nominimet e tjera përfshijnë Filmin, Regjisorin, Kinematografinë, Kostumografinë, Montazhin, Muzikën e filmit, Konceptimin vizual, Montazhin e zërit, Miksimin e zërit dhe Skenarin origjinal më të mirë. Dy këngë të filmit, ""Audition (The Fools Who Dream)"" dhe ""City of Stars"", morën nominimet për këngën më të mirë origjinale. Studioja ""Lionsgate"" mori 26 nominime - më tepër se çdo studio tjetër."
mt: This film, starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling, was nominated for all the major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated respectively as best actor and actress. The other nominations include the film, the director, the cinematography, the costume design, the editing, the original music score, the visual design, the sound editing, the sound mixing and the original screenplay. Two songs from the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", received nominations for best original song. The studio "Lionsgate" received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: "Nga televizioni NHK u raportua po ashtu se funksionimi i termocentralit nuklear Kashiwazaki Kariwa në prefekturën Niigata vazhdonte si normalisht. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. njoftoi se nuk kishte asnjë pasojë nga tërmeti dhe se reaktorët numër 1 dhe 2 në termocentralin e saj bërthamor në Shika u mbyllën. Njoftohet se rreth 9400 banesa në zonë janë pa ujë dhe afro 100 pa energji elektrike. Disa rrugë janë prishur, shërbimi hekurudhor në zonat e prekura u ndërpre dhe aeroporti ""Noto"" në prefekturën e Ishikavës vazhdon të jetë i mbyllur."
mt: NHK reported that the nuclear power plant Kashiwazaki Kariwa in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that there were no effects from the earthquake and that the reactors 1 and 2 at its nuclear power plant in Shika were closed. It was reported that about 9,400 homes in the area were without water and about 100 without electricity. Some roads were damaged, train service in the affected areas was suspended and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture was still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Sipas informatave, dokumenti do t'i referohet kundërshtimit të kufijve, të cilët Palestina i do sipas kufijve para luftës së Lindjes së Mesme të vitit 1967. Mendohet se temat e tjera që mbulohen përfshijnë shtetin e ardhshëm të Jerusalemit që është i shenjtë për të dy kombet dhe çështjen e Luginës së Jordanit. Izraeli, deri në nënshkrimin e kësaj marrëveshjeje, kërkon të ketë një prani ushtarake të vazhdueshme në luginë për dhjetë vjet, ndërkohë që autoritetet palestineze bien dakord me lejimin e pranisë së tyre për vetëm pesë vite.
mt: According to reports, the document will address the opposition to the borders, which Palestine wants according to the pre-1967 Middle East War borders. It is thought that other issues covered include the future state of Jerusalem, which is holy to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel, until the signing of this agreement, demands a continued military presence in the valley for ten years, while Palestinian authorities agree to their presence for only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Ma Ying-jeou-i lindi në Hong-Kong dhe dikur mbante ""kartën jeshile"" si rezident ligjërisht i përhershëm në Amerikë. Ai ndoqi studimet në Universitetin e Nju Jorkut e më pas në Fakultetin e drejtësisë në Harvard. Hsieh la të nënkuptohej gjatë zgjedhjeve se Ma mund të largohej nga vendi në rast krize. Shiei tregoi po ashtu se fotogjenikja Ma kishte më tepër stil sesa përmbajtje. Pavarësisht këtyre akuzave, Ma Ying-jeou-i fitoi lehtësisht nëpërmjet një platforme që promovonte raporte më të ngushta me Kinën kontinentale."
mt: "Ma Ying-jeou was born in Hong Kong and once held a "green card" as a legally permanent resident of the United States. He studied at New York University and then at Harvard Law School. Hsieh implied that Ma could leave the country in case of crisis. Hsieh also said that Ma's photogenicity had more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma Ying-jeou easily won on a platform that promoted closer ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: "Pasi ishte e qartë se mjaft familje po kërkonin ndihmë ligjore për të luftuar kundër dëbimeve, më 20 mars, u zhvillua një takim në Qendrën Ligjore të Komunitetit të Gjirit Lindor për viktimat e skemës së mashtrimit të strehimit. Kur qiramarrësit nisën të diskutonin me njëri-tjetrin për atë që u kishte ndodhur, pjesa më e madhe e familjeve që ishin përfshirë e kuptuan papritur se Kerolin Uillsoni nga Autoriteti i Oklandit për Strehimin kishte vjedhur depozitat e tyre të sigurisë dhe kishte ikur nxitimthi nga qyteti. Qiramarrësit në ""Lockwood Gardens"" mendojnë se mund të jenë dhe 40 familje të tjera ose më shumë që do të përballen me dëbimin, pasi mësuan se policia e Autoritetit të Strehimit të Oklandit po heton edhe prona të tjera të strehimit publik në Oakland që mund të jenë përfshirë në skemën mashtruese të strehimit."
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the Eastern Bay Community Legal Center for victims of the shelter scam. When the litigants began to discuss with each other what had happened, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carol Wilson of the Oakland Shelter Authority had stolen their security deposits and had fled the city. The litigants in "Lockwood Gardens" think there may be and 40 more families or more who will face eviction, after learning that the Oakland Shelter Authority police are investigating other public shelter properties in Oakland that may be involved in the shelter scam.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Pas kësaj gare, Keselowski vazhdon të jetë kryesuesi i Kampionatit të pilotëve me 2250 pikë. Me shtatë pikë pas, Xhonsoin është i dyti me 2243. Në vend të tretë, Hamlini është njëzet pikë pas, por pesë para Boujerit. Kane dhe Trueksi i Riu janë përkatësisht i pesti dhe i gjashti me 2220 dhe 2207 pikë. Stjuarti, Gordoni, Kenseti dhe Harviku u pozicionuan në dhjetë vendet e para të Kampionatit të Pilotëve, edhe pse sezoni ka ende katër gara të mbetura.
mt: After this race, Keselowski continues to lead the Drivers' Championship with 2250 points. With seven points back, Harvick is second with 2243. In third, Hamlin is 20 points back, but five ahead of Bowyer. Busch and Truex Jr. are respectively fifth and sixth with 2220 and 2207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick are positioned in the top ten of the Drivers' Championship, although the season still has four races left.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Kjo mendohet se është e pesta herë në histori që njerëzit kanë vënë re atë që doli se ishte lëndë e konfirmuar nga ana kimike që binte nga Marsi në Tokë. Prej afro 24 000 meteorëve të njohur të rënë në Tokë, thuajse vetëm 34 janë vërtetuar se e kanë prejardhjen nga Marsi. Pesëmbëdhjetë nga këta shkëmbinj janë krijuar si pasojë e shiut të meteorëve korrikun e shkuar. Disa nga shkëmbinjtë, të cilët janë vërtet të rrallë në Tokë, shiten nga 11 000 US$ deri në 22 500 US$ për ons, që është rreth 10 herë më shumë se çmimi i arit.
mt: 24,000 meteorites are known to have fallen on Earth, but only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of these meteorites were created as a result of the July meteor shower. Some of the rare meteorites, which sell for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, are about ten times more valuable than gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Shumakeri, i cili doli në pension në vitin 2006 pas fitores së kampionatit të Formula 1 shtatë herë, pritej të zëvendësonte të dëmtuarin Felipe Masa. Braziliani pësoi një dëmtim të rëndë në kokë pas një përplasjeje gjatë Çmimit të Madh Hungarez 2009. Massa nuk pritet të marrë pjesë të paktën për pjesën e mbetur të sezonit të vitit 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired after winning the title seven times, was expected to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury in a crash during the Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa is not expected to take part in the rest of the 2009 season at least.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Deri tani, AOL-i ka mundur ta lëvizë dhe ta zhvillojë tregun e mesazhimit të çastit sipas ritmit të vet, për arsye të përdorimit të tij të përhapur brenda SHBA-së. Pas zbatimit të kësaj marrëveshjeje, kjo liri mund të mbarojë. Numri i përdoruesve të shërbimeve të Yahoo! dhe Microsoft të marrë së bashku do të rivalizojnë numrin e klientëve të AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the instant messaging market at its own pace, due to its widespread use in the United States. After this agreement, this freedom may end. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services together will rival AOL's client number.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Një makinë-bombë që shpërtheu dje në mëngjes në rajonin e policisë në Gaziantep të Turqisë vrau dy oficerë policie dhe lëndoi më shumë se njëzet persona të tjerë. Zyra e guvernatorit tha se nëntëmbëdhjetë prej të plagosurve ishin oficerë policie. Policia tha se ata dyshojnë se përgjegjës për sulmin mund të jetë një militant i pretenduar i Shtetit Islamik (ISIL).
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 30 others were injured when a car bomb exploded in the police district in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning. The governor's office said that 29 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect the attack was carried out by an Islamic State (ISIL) militant.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: "Ish-guvernatori i Masaçusetsit, Mit Romnei, fitoi të martën zgjedhjet presidenciale primare të Partisë Republikane të Floridës me mbi 46 për qind të votave. Ish-kryetari i Dhomës së Përfaqësuesve të Shteteve të Bashkuara, Njut Gingriç, u rendit i dyti me 32 për qind. Si një shtet me parimin ""fituesi i merr të gjitha"", Florida ia dha të pesëdhjetë delegatët e saj Romney-it, duke e shtyrë atë përpara si konkurrentin kryesor për emërimin nga Partia Republikane."
mt: 2012 Republican presidential primary results in Florida
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Ish-kryetari i Dhomës, Njut Gingriç, guvernatori i Teksasit, Rik Perri, dhe anëtarja e Kongresit, Mishel Bakman, dolën përkatësisht në vendin e katërt, të pestë dhe të gjashtë. Pasi dolën rezultatet, Gingrich vlerësoi Santorum, por foli ashpër për Romney, në emër të të cilit u transmetuan reklama negative elektorale kundër Gingrich në Ioua. Perri tha se ""do të kthehem në Teksas për të vlerësuar rezultatet e mbledhjes së mbrëmjes së sotme me krerët e partisë e për të vendosur nëse kam një të ardhme në këtë garë"", por më pas tha se do të qëndronte në garë dhe do të garonte në zgjedhjet e 21 janarit për emërimin e kandidatëve në Karolinën e Jugut. Bachmann, e cila rezultoi fituese e sondazhit të ""Ames Straw"" në gusht, vendosi ti jepte fund fushatës së saj elektorale."
mt: 2012 Republican Party presidential primaries: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in fourth, Governor Rick Perry of Texas came in fifth, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann of Minnesota came in sixth. After the results, Gingrich praised Santorum, but spoke harshly of Romney, on whose behalf negative ads were aired against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's meeting with party leaders and decide if I have a future in this race," but later said he would stay in the race and compete in the January 21 primary in South Carolina. Bachmann, who came in first in the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her presidential campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Ish-kryetari i Dhomës, Njut Gingriç, guvernatori i Teksasit, Rik Perri, dhe anëtarja e Kongresit, Mishel Bakman, dolën përkatësisht në vendin e katërt, të pestë dhe të gjashtë. Pasi dolën rezultatet, Gingrich vlerësoi Santorum, por foli ashpër për Romney, në emër të të cilit u transmetuan reklama negative elektorale kundër Gingrich në Ioua. Perri tha se ""do të kthehem në Teksas për të vlerësuar rezultatet e mbledhjes së mbrëmjes së sotme me krerët e partisë e për të vendosur nëse kam një të ardhme në këtë garë"", por më pas tha se do të qëndronte në garë dhe do të garonte në zgjedhjet e 21 janarit për emërimin e kandidatëve në Karolinën e Jugut. Bachmann, e cila rezultoi fituese e sondazhit të ""Ames Straw"" në gusht, vendosi ti jepte fund fushatës së saj elektorale."

Bachmann, who came in first in the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her presidential campaign.

src: "Faqja ueb e stacionit e cilëson shfaqjen si ""teatër radiofonik i shkollës së vjetër me një tregim të ri të çuditshëm dhe të egër""! Në fillesën e tij, programi u transmetua vetëm online në kanalin radiofonik TogiNet Radio, një ueb-kanal i fokusuar në bisedat radiofonike me të ftuarit. Në fund të 2015-s, AstroNet Radio u krijua nga TogiNet si një stacion dytësor. Në shfaqje përfshiheshin fillimisht aktorë amatorë të zërit nga vetë Teksasi lindor."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as "a radio play of the old school with a new and wild story!" In its debut, the program was broadcast only online on TogiNet Radio, a web channel focused on radio interviews with guests. In late 2015, AstroNet Radio was created by TogiNet as a secondary station. The show featured initially amateur voice actors from East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: "Sulmuesit e Mumbait mbërritën me varkë më 26 nëntor 2008, duke sjellë me vete granata e armë automatike dhe goditën shumë objekte, përfshi stacionin hekurudhor ""Chhatrapati Shivaji"" të mbushur me njerëz dhe hotelin e famshëm ""Taj Mahal"". Zbulimi e grumbullimi i informacionit nga David Hedli kishte ndihmuar që operacioni të kryhej nga 10 personat e armatosur nga grupi militant pakistanez Laskhar-e-Taiba. Sulmi shkaktoi një tendosje shumë të madhe të marrëdhënieve ndërmjet Indisë dhe Pakistanit."
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat, bringing with them grenades and automatic weapons and attacked many targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. The discovery and collation of information by David Headley had helped the operation to be carried out by 10 armed members of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack caused a great strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Rekordi i Nadalit përballë kanadezit është 7-2. Së fundi humbi kundrejt Raonicut gjatë turneut Brisbane Open. Nadali kapi 88% të pikëve neto në ndeshje, duke fituar 76 pikë në shërbimin e parë. Mbreti i Baltës tha pas ndeshjes: ""Jam thjesht i emocionuar që jam sërish në raundet finale të evenimenteve më të rëndësishme. Jam këtu që të përpiqem ta fitoj këtë."""
mt: Nadal's record against the Canadian is 7-2. He last lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal took 88% of the net points in the match, winning 76 points in the first set. The King of Clay said after the match: "I'm just excited to be back in the finals of the biggest events. I'm here to try to win this."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: """Naked News"" njoftoi javën e kaluar se do të shtojë në mënyrë të konsiderueshme, me tri transmetime të reja, mandatin e saj të gjuhëve ndërkombëtare për raportimin e lajmeve. Me raportime aktualisht në anglisht dhe japonisht, organizata globale po fillon programe në spanjisht, italisht dhe koreanisht, për televizion, ueb dhe pajisje celulare."
mt: "Naked News" announced last week that it will significantly increase, with three new broadcasts, its mandate of international languages for reporting the news. With reports currently in English and Japanese, the global organization is starting programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean, for television, web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "Përveç aktivitetit të së mërkurës, Carpanedo konkurroi edhe në dy gara individuale në kampionat. E para e saj ishte sllallomi, ku mori ""Nuk e përfundoi"" në tentativën e saj të parë. 36 nga 116 garues arritën rezultat të njëjtë në atë garë. Në garën tjetër të saj, sllallomin e madh, ajo përfundoi në vendin e dhjetë në grupin për femra ulur, me një kohë të kombinuar ecjeje 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minuta më ngadalë se sa përfunduesja e vendit të parë, austriakja Klaudia Lësh, dhe 1:09.02 minuta më ngadalë se përfunduesja e vendit të nëntë, Giongi Dani e Hungarisë. Katër skiatore në kategorinë e ulur të skive për femra nuk arritën ta përfundonin garën e tyre dhe 45 nga 117 skiatore në total të Kampionatit Botëror të Skijimit Alpin nuk arritën të klasifikoheshin në garë ."
mt: "In addition to her Wednesday activity, Carpanedo also competed in two individual events in the championship. Her first was slalom, where she received "Did not finish" in her first attempt. 36 of 116 competitors received the same result in that event. In her second event, giant slalom, she finished tenth in the women's sitting group, with a combined skiing time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first-place finisher, Austrian Claudia Lesh, and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth-place finisher, Hungarian Giongi Dani. Four skiers in the sitting category for women did not finish their race and 45 of 117 skiers in total of the World Alpine Skiing Championship did not qualify in any of their events."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Shoqata Kombëtare e Basketbollit (NBA) e SHBA-së e pezulloi të mërkurën sezonin e saj të basketbollit profesionist për arsye të shqetësimeve që lidhen me COVID-19. Vendimi i NBA-së erdhi pasi një lojtar i Utah Jazz u testua pozitiv për virusin COVID-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States suspended its professional basketball season on Wednesday for concerns related to the COVID-19 virus. The NBA's decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: "Lojtari i sotëm i ditës është Aleks Oveshkini nga ""Washington Capitals"". Ai shënoi dy gola dhe dy asistime në fitoren 5-3 të Uashingtonit kundër ""Atlanta Thrashers"". Asistimi i parë i Ovechkin i kësaj nate ishte për golin përcaktues të ndeshjes nga lojtari i ri Nicklas Backstrom; Goli i dytë i asaj mbrëmje shënonte golin e tij të 60-të të sezonit, duke u bërë lojtari i parë që shënon 60 e më shumë gola brenda një sezoni që prej sezonit të 1995-96-ës, kur Jaromir Jagri dhe Mario Lemiëri e arritën këtë numër të rëndësishëm."
mt: "Today's player of the day is Aleks Ovechkin of the ""Washington Capitals"". He scored two goals and two assists in the Capitals' 5-3 win over the ""Atlanta Thrashers"". Ovechkin's first assist of the night was for the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; the second goal of the evening marked his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since the 1995-96 season, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux achieved this significant number."
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "Banka ""Northern Rock"" ishte shtetëzuar në vitin 2008, pasi u zbulua se shoqëria kishte marrë ndihmë urgjente prej qeverisë së Mbretërisë së Bashkuar. ""Northern Rock"" kishte kërkuar ndihmë për shkak të ekspozimit të saj gjatë krizës së hipotekave pa garanci të mjaftueshme në vitin 2007. ""Virgin Group"" i Sër Riçard Bransonit kishte një ofertë për bankën që u refuzua para shtetëzimit të bankës. Kur u shtetëzua në vitin 2010, banka aktuale kryesore ""Northern Rock plc"" u nda nga ""banka e keqe"", ""Northern Rock"" (Administrimi i aseteve). Virgin ka blerë vetëm ""bankën e mirë"" të Northern Rock, dhe jo shoqërinë e menaxhimit të aktiveve."
mt: "Northern Rock" was nationalised in 2008, after it was revealed that the company had taken emergency funding from the United Kingdom government. "Northern Rock" had sought help due to its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. "Virgin Group" of Sir Richard Branson had a bid for the bank that was rejected before the bank's nationalisation. When the bank was nationalised in 2010, the current main bank "Northern Rock plc" was separated from the "bad bank", "Northern Rock" (Asset Management). Virgin has only bought the "good bank" of Northern Rock, and not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Vendimi i z. Rud për të firmosur akordin e Kiotos për klimën izolon Shtetet e Bashkuara, të cilat do të jenë tani i vetmi vend i zhvilluar që nuk ka miratuar marrëveshjen. Qeveria e mëparshme konservatore australiane e refuzoi ratifikimin e Kiotos, duke thënë se do ta dëmtonte ekonominë e cila mbështetet fuqishëm te eksportet e qymyrit, ndërkohë që shtete si India dhe Kina nuk prekeshin nga objektivat e emetimeve.
mt: The decision by Mr Rudd to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed country not to have ratified the agreement. The previous conservative Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy which is heavily reliant on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not affected by the targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Vendimi i z. Rud për të firmosur akordin e Kiotos për klimën izolon Shtetet e Bashkuara, të cilat do të jenë tani i vetmi vend i zhvilluar që nuk ka miratuar marrëveshjen. Qeveria e mëparshme konservatore australiane e refuzoi ratifikimin e Kiotos, duke thënë se do ta dëmtonte ekonominë e cila mbështetet fuqishëm te eksportet e qymyrit, ndërkohë që shtete si India dhe Kina nuk prekeshin nga objektivat e emetimeve.
mt: The decision by Mr Rudd to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed country not to have ratified the agreement. The previous conservative Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy which is heavily reliant on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not affected by the targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Qitësit duhej të mbikëqyreshin nga afër nga rojet gjatë provës shtesë të kontrollit të kafshëve të dëmshme, pasi prova u monitorua dhe u vlerësua për efektshmërinë e saj. Në një partneritet të Shërbimit të Parqeve Kombëtare dhe Kafshëve të Egra dhe Shoqatës së Qitësve Sportivë të Australisë, u rekrutuan vullnetarë të kualifikuar, nën programin e gjuetisë së Shoqatës së Qitësve Sportivë. Sipas Mick O'Flynn, zëvendësdrejtori për Mbrojtjen dhe Trashëgiminë e Parkut në NPWS, katër gjuetarëve të zgjedhur për operacionin e parë të gjuetisë u janë dhënë udhëzime të zgjeruara për sigurinë dhe trajnimin e tyre.
mt: The shooters were to be supervised by park rangers during the additional pest control test, as the test was monitored and evaluated for its effectiveness. In a partnership between the National Parks and Wildlife Service and the Australian Sporting Shooters Association, qualified volunteers were recruited under the ASSA's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS deputy director for protection and park heritage, four shooters selected for the first hunting operation were given extended safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Në bazë të këtij fosili, kjo do të thotë se ndarja ka qenë shumë më e hershme se sa është parashikuar nga provat molekulare. ""Kjo nënkupton që çdo gjë duhet të kthehet prapa në kohë"", - tha Berhan Asfavi, studiues në Shërbimin Studimor të Rift Vallejit në Etiopi dhe bashkautor i studimit."
mt: "Based on this fossil, this means that the split was much earlier than has been predicted by molecular data. ""This means that everything has to go back in time"", - said Berhan Asfaw, a researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and co-author of the study."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Në prezantimin kryesor të së enjtes në Tokyo Game Show, presidenti i Nintendos, Satoru Iwata, prezantoi modelin e dorezës së kontrollit për aparatin e ri Nintendo Revolution. I ngjashëm me telekomandën e televizorit, kontrolluesi përdor dy sensorë të vënë pranë televizorit të përdoruesit për të trekëndëzuar pozicionin e tij në hapësirën tredimensionale. Kjo do t'u mundësojë lojtarëve të kontrollojnë veprimet dhe lëvizjet në videolojëra duke e lëvizur pajisjen në ajër.
mt: In the keynote address at the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata introduced the controller for the new Nintendo Revolution. Similar to the remote control for the television, the controller uses two sensors placed near the player's television to triangulate his position in the three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Më herët, agjencia kineze e lajmeve Xinhua njoftoi se ishte rrëmbyer një aeroplan. Njoftimet e mëpasshme thanë më tej se aeroplani mori kërcënim për bombë dhe u kthye sërish në Afganistan, duke u ulur në Kandahar. Raportet e para thonë se aeroplani u kthye mbrapsht në Afganistan pasi iu refuzua ulja urgjente në Ürümqi.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported that a plane had been hijacked. Subsequent reports then said the plane had been threatened with a bomb and returned to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. Initial reports say the plane returned to Afghanistan after being denied an urgent landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Të hënën, Sara Daniusi, sekretare e përhershme e Komitetit të Çmimit Nobel për Letërsinë në Akademinë Suedeze, njoftoi publikisht në një program radiofonik të radios ""Sveriges"" në Suedi, se komiteti, duke mos qenë në gjendje të kontaktojë drejtpërdrejt me Bob Dilanin rreth fitimit të Çmimit Nobel në Letërsi për vitin 2016, kishte ndërprerë përpjekjet për ta kontaktuar. Daniusi tha: ""Në këtë moment nuk po bëjmë asgjë. I kam telefonuar dhe dërguar disa emaile bashkëpunëtorit të tij më të afërt dhe mora përgjigje tepër miqësore. Për momentin, është sigurisht e mjaftueshme """
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, announced publicly on a radio program of the Swedish radio station "Sveriges", that the committee, having been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan about winning the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016, had stopped trying to contact him. Danius said: "At this point we are not doing anything. I have called and sent a few emails to his closest associate and got a very friendly response. For now, it is certainly enough"
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara, Xhorxh U. Bush, e mirëpriti njoftimin. Zëdhënësi i Bushit, Gordon Johndroe, e quajti premtimin e bërë nga Korea e Veriut ""një hap të rëndësishëm drejt qëllimit të denuklearizimit të gadishullit korean."""
mt: "President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean pledge "a significant step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "Në vitin 1956, Słania u zhvendos në Suedi ku tre vite më vonë filloi të punojë për Zyrën postare suedeze dhe u bë gdhendësi kryesor për ta. Ai ka prodhuar mbi 1000 pulla për Suedinë dhe 28 shtete të tjera. Veprat e tij kanë një cilësi dhe hollësi kaq të njohur, saqë është njëri prej pak ""emrave të njohur"" të filatelistëve. Disa kanë specialitet të vetëm mbledhjen e veprave të tij. Pulla e tij e 1000-të ishte e mrekullueshmja ""Bëmat e mëdha nga mbretërit e Suedisë"" nga David Kloker Ehrenstrail në vitin 2000, e cila përmendet në librin e rekordeve botërore ""Guinness"". Ai u mor gjithashtu me gdhendjen e kartëmonedhave për shumë vende. Shembujt e fundit të punës së tij përfshijnë portretet kryeministrore në anën e përparme të kartëmonedhave të reja kanadeze 5 dhe 100 dollarëshe."
mt: 1956, Słania moved to Sweden where three years later he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became its chief engraver. He has produced over 1000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His works have such a quality and fineness that he is one of the few "well-known" names of philatelists. Some have speciality only the collection of his works. His 1000th stamp was the magnificent "Great deeds of the kings of Sweden" by David Kloker Ehrenstrail in 2000, which is mentioned in the world record book "Guinness". He also took up the engraving of banknotes for many countries. The latest examples of his work include portraits of prime ministers on the obverse of new Canadian 5 and 100 dollar bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 milje të sistemit naftësjellës Trans-Alaska u mbyllën pas një rrjedhjeje prej mijëra fuçish nafteje bruto në jug të Ferbanksit në Alaskë. Një ndërprerje e energjisë elektrike pas testit rutinë të sistemit të kontrollit të zjarrit bëri që të hapeshin valvulat e çlirimit dhe nafta e papërpunuar të derdhej në afërsi të stacionit nr.9 të pompimit në Fort Greely. Hapja e valvulave lejoi çlirimin e presionit për sistemin dhe nafta rrodhi në një platformë me një depozitë me kapacitet 55 000 fuçi (2,3 milionë galonë). Që nga pasditja e të mërkurës, vrimat e rezervuarit vazhdonin të rridhnin, ndoshta nga zgjerimi termik brenda rezervuarit. Një zonë tjetër dytësore e kontrollit nën rezervuarë që mund të mbajë 104 500 fuçi nuk ishte mbushur ende plotësisht.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska pipeline was shut down after a flow of thousands of barrels of crude oil in the south of Fairbanks in Alaska. A power outage after a routine test of the fire control system opened the release valves and unprocessed oil flowed near the pumping station No. 9 in Fort Greely. Opening the valves allowed the release of pressure for the system and oil rrodhi in a platform with a capacity of 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). Since the morning of Monday, the cracks in the reservoir continued to flow, perhaps from thermal expansion within the reservoir. A second control area under the reservoir that could hold 104,500 barrels was not filled yet completely.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Korpusi i Inxhinierëve të Shteteve të Bashkuara llogariti se 6 inç reshje mund të çanin argjinaturat e prishura më parë. Lagjja Nëntë, e cila pa përmbytje të lartë deri në 20 këmbë gjatë uraganit Katrina, është aktualisht në ujë deri në mes, pasi u kalua argjinatura në afërsi. Uji po derdhet nga argjinatura në një pjesë 100 këmbë të gjerë.
mt: 6 inches of rain were enough to break the earlier damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which had been flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently underwater up to mid-calf, as a levee was breached in the area. Water is pouring over the levee in a 100-foot wide section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: "Hamiltoni pohoi se Spitali Universitar ""Howard"" e shtroi të sëmurin në gjendje të qëndrueshme. Ky pacient kishte qëndruar në Nigeri, ku janë shfaqur raste të virusit Ebola. Spitali ka zbatuar protokollin për kontrollin e infeksionit, përfshi veçimin e pacientit nga të tjerët, për të parandaluar infektimin e mundshëm të tyre."
mt: "Hamilton said the Howard University Hospital had placed the patient in isolation. The patient had been in Nigeria, where Ebola cases have been reported. The hospital had followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent possible infection."
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Ka mundësi që kometat të kenë qenë një burim i dërgimit të ujit në tokë, bashkë me lëndët organike të cilat mund të krijojnë proteina e të ndihmojnë jetën. Shkencëtarët shpresojnë të kuptojnë krijimin e planetëve, sidomos se si u krijua Toka nga përplasja e kometave kohë më parë.
mt: It is possible that comets have been a source of water delivery to Earth, along with organic matter that can create proteins and help life. Scientists hope to understand the creation of planets, especially how Earth was created by the collision of comets earlier.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Ndonëse autoritetet janë të pasigurt për besueshmërinë e kërcënimit, Autoriteti i Transportit i Merilandit kreu mbylljen nën presionin e FBI-së. Kamionët e mbeturinave u përdorën për të bllokuar hyrjet e metrosë dhe 80 policë qëndronin në gadishmëri për t'i drejtuar shoferët në rrugët e tërthorta. Nuk u njoftuan vonesa për shkak të trafikut të rënduar në unazën automobilistike që është rruga alternative e qytetit.
mt: Although authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed under pressure from the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block the subway entrances and 80 police officers stood guard on the streets to direct drivers around the congested roads. No delays were reported due to heavy traffic on the city's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Ndonëse autoritetet janë të pasigurt për besueshmërinë e kërcënimit, Autoriteti i Transportit i Merilandit kreu mbylljen nën presionin e FBI-së. Kamionët e mbeturinave u përdorën për të bllokuar hyrjet e metrosë dhe 80 policë qëndronin në gadishmëri për t'i drejtuar shoferët në rrugët e tërthorta. Nuk u njoftuan vonesa për shkak të trafikut të rënduar në unazën automobilistike që është rruga alternative e qytetit.
mt: Although authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed under pressure from the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block the subway entrances and 80 police officers stood guard on the streets to direct drivers around the congested roads. No delays were reported due to heavy traffic on the city's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotografi u transportua në qendrën mjekësore ""Ronald Regan"" të Universitetit të Kalifornisë, Los Anxheles, ku vdiq më pas. U raportua se ai ishte rreth 20 vjeç. Bieber u shpreh me anë të një deklarate se ""megjithëse s’isha i pranishëm dhe as i përfshirë direkt në këtë aksident tragjik, mendimet dhe lutjet e mia shkojnë për familjen e viktimës"". Uebsajti i lajmeve argëtuese TMZ e kupton që fotografi e ndaloi automjetin e tij në anën tjetër të bulevardit ""Sepulveda"" dhe tentoi të fotografonte ndalimin e policisë para se të kapërcente rrugën dhe të vazhdonte, duke e shtyrë oficerin e Policisë Rrugore të Kalifornisë që po kryente ndalimin e trafikut ta urdhëronte të kthehej pas dy herë. Sipas policisë, drejtuesi i automjetit që goditi fotografin ka mundësi të mos përballet me akuza penale."
mt: The photographer was transported to the Ronald Regan Medical Center of the University of California, Los Angeles, where he later died. He was reported to be about 20 years old. Bieber expressed through a statement that "although I was not present and not directly involved in this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." TMZ news site understands that the photographer stopped his car on the other side of the boulevard "Sepulveda" and tried to photograph the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, pushing the California Highway Patrol officer who was conducting the traffic stop to order him to turn back twice. According to police, the driver of the car that hit the photographer has the possibility of not facing criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Testi i Ariasit doli pozitiv për një rast të lehtë të virusit, - u shpreh ministri presidencial Rodrigo Ariasi. Gjendja e presidentit është e stabilizuar, ndonëse do të izolohet në banesë për disa ditë. Përveç dhimbjes së fytit dhe etheve, ndihem mirë dhe jam në formë për ta bërë punën time në distancë. ""Pres t'u rikthehem të gjitha funksioneve të mia të hënën"", - tha në një deklaratë Ariasi."
mt: "Arias' test came back positive for a light case of the virus," said presidential minister Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, although he will isolate himself at home for a few days. In addition to the sore throat and fever, I feel well and am in shape to do my job from a distance. "I will return to all my functions on Monday," he said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Në kulmin e tij, cikloni tropikal Gonu, i cili e ka marrë emrin nga një torbë me gjethe palme në gjuhën maldiviane, arriti erëra të vazhdueshme me shpejtësi 240 km/orë (149 milje/orë). Deri në orët e para të ditës së sotme, erërat ishin afro 83 km/h dhe pritej të vijonin të dobësoheshin.
mt: At its peak, tropical cyclone Gonu, which took its name from a palm frond in the Maldivian language, reached sustained winds of 240 km/h (149 mph). By early morning today, winds were down to about 83 km/h and were expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Batica e kuqe shkaktohet nga përqendrimi mbi normalen i Karenia brevis, një organizëm njëqelizor detar që ekziston në mënyrë të natyrshme. Mundësia e kryqëzimit të faktorëve natyrorë për krijimin e kushteve ideale i lejon këto alga të shumëfishohen jashtëzakonisht shumë. Algat prodhojnë një neurotoksinë që mund të dëmtojë nervat te qeniet njerëzore dhe te peshqit. Peshqit shpesh ngordhin si pasojë e përqendrimeve të larta të toksinave në ujë. Njerëzit mund të preken nëse thithin me anë të frymëmarrjes ujin e prekur që ngrihet në ajër nga era e valët.
mt: The red tide is caused by a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism, Karenia brevis. The ability of natural factors to create ideal conditions allows these algae to multiply abnormally. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can damage the nerves of humans and fish. Fish often die as a result of high levels of toxins in the water. People can be affected if they inhale the contaminated water that is raised in the air by the waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Dikur stuhi e kategorisë 4 në shkallën Saffir-Simpson për uraganet, Felicia u dobësua në ciklon tropikal para se të davaritej të martën. Mbetjet e saj shkaktuan rrebeshe në shumicën e ishujve, ndonëse nuk janë raportuar ende dëme ose përmbytje. Reshjet e regjistruara nga një matës rreshjesh në Oahu, të cilat arritën nivelin 6,34 inç, janë përshkruar si ""të dobishme"". Një pjesë e reshjeve të shiut u shoqëruan me shtrëngata dhe rrufe të vazhdueshme."
mt: 4-category storm in the Saffir-Simpson scale for hurricanes, Felicia weakened to a tropical cyclone before striking Monday. Its remnants caused flooding on most of the islands, although no damage or flooding has yet been reported. Rainfall recorded by a rain gauge on Oahu, which reached 6.34 inches, was described as "beneficial." Some of the rain was accompanied by sustained lightning and thunder.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Pike Xhunior u rrëzua gjatë Çmimit të Madh të Singaporit 2008 pak pas një ndalese të mëparshme në vendndalim për Fernando Alonson, duke nxjerrë makinën e sigurisë. Ndërkohë që makinat përpara Alonso-s u futën në bokse me daljen e makinës së sigurisë, ai kaloi përpara grupit duke marrë fitoren. Pike Xhunior u pushua pas Çmimit të Madh të Hungarisë të vitit 2009.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix was red flagged after a previous stoppage for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. While the cars ahead of Alonso were boxed in by the safety car, he passed the group to take the win. The race was stopped after the Hungarian Grand Prix of 2009.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Një studim i botuar ditën e enjte në revistën Shkenca raportoi për krijimin e një specieje të re zogjsh në ishujt Galapagos të Ekuadorit. Studiuesit nga Universiteti i Prinstonit në Shtetet e Bashkuara dhe në Universitetin e Upsalas në Suedi, njoftuan se llojet e reja evoluan vetëm në dy gjenerata, megjithëse mendohej se ky proces zgjaste më gjatë, për shkak të kryqëzimit midis një trishtili endemik të Darvinit, Geospiza fortes, dhe trishtilit të ardhur të kaktusit, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported the creation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden, announced that the new species evolved only in two generations, although it was thought that this process took longer, due to crossbreeding between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and an arriving cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: "Aktiviteti artistik bën pjesë gjithashtu në një fushatë nga bashkia e Bukureshtit që kërkon të riprezantojë imazhin e kryeqytetit rumun si një metropol krijues dhe me shumë ngjyra. Qyteti do të jetë i pari në Evropën juglindore që organizon ""CowParade"", aktiviteti më i madh i artit publik në botë, nga qershori deri në gusht të këtij viti."
mt: "Artistic activity is also part of a campaign by the city of Bucharest that seeks to represent the image of the Romanian capital as a creative metropolis and with many colors. The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to organize "CowParade", the largest public art event in the world, from June to August this year."
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Avioni ishte nisur për në Irkutsk dhe po përdorej nga trupat lokale. Një hetim u ngrit për të hetuar këtë. Që prej viteve 70, Il-76 ka qenë një komponent kryesor si i ushtrisë ruse, ashtu dhe i asaj sovjetike, dhe kishte pësuar tashmë një aksident serioz në Rusi muajin e shkuar. Më 7 tetor, një motor u shkëput gjatë ngritjes, pa lëndime. Rusia e uli Il-76s në tokë për pak kohë pas atij aksidenti.
mt: The plane was headed to Irkutsk and was being used by local troops. An investigation was launched to investigate this. Since the 1970s, the Il-76 has been a key component both of the Russian and Soviet armies, and had already suffered a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine fell off during takeoff, without injuries. Russia grounded Il-76s for a short time after that accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: "Para The Simpsons, Simon kishte punuar në pozicione të ndryshme në mjaft shfaqje. Gjatë viteve 1980, ai punoi në shfaqje si p.sh. ""Taxi"", ""Cheers"" dhe ""The Tracey Ullman Show"". Në vitin 1989, ai ndihmoi për krijimin e ""The Simpsons"" me Bruksin dhe Groeningun dhe kishte përgjegjësinë për të punësuar ekipin e parë të shkrimtarëve të shfaqjes. Ai ruajti titullin e producentit ekzekutiv dhe vazhdoi të merrte dhjetëra miliona dollarë honorare çdo sezon, pavarësisht se u largua nga shfaqja në vitin 1993."
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon had worked in various positions on many shows. In the 1980s, he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. He retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars in royalties per season, despite leaving the show in 1993.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluku shkroi se përpjekjet e disave për t'i nxitur gratë që të flisnin rreth shëndetit të tyre ishin të pasuksesshme. Ajo arriti në këtë përfundim për shkak të një morie komentesh pozitive dhe inkurajimit ndaj saj nga individë femra e meshkuj që kërkonin që mjekimet kontraceptive të konsideroheshin si një nevojë mjekësore.
mt: Fluke wrote that some people's efforts to encourage women to talk about their health had been unsuccessful. She reached this conclusion because of a barrage of positive comments and encouragement from both male and female individuals who wanted contraceptive treatments to be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "Do të sillet si uji. Ai është i tejdukshëm sikurse dhe uji. Pra, nëse do të qëndronit pranë vijës bregdetare, do të mund të shikonit çdo guralec ose mbeturina që do të ishin në fund. ""Me sa dimë, është vetëm një trup planetar që shfaq më shumë dinamizën se Titani dhe quhet Tokë"", - shtoi Stofani."
mt: "It will behave like water. It is as impermeable as water. So, if you were standing on the beach, you would be able to see every pebble or piece of trash that was there.""As far as we know, it's just a planetary body that shows more dynamism than Titan and is called Earth," - he added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
