src: "Kjo konfirmon jo vetëm që të paktën disa dinozaurë kishin pendë, një teori tashmë e njohur, por siguron detaje që nuk mund të sigurohen zakonisht nga fosilet, si ngjyra dhe prezantimi tredimensional. Sipas shkencëtarëve, në pjesën e sipërme kjo kafshë kishte pendë ngjyrë kafe në gështenjë dhe, në pjesën e poshtme, pendë me një ngjyrë të zbehtë ose karotenoidi. Ky zbulim na jep po ashtu një ide rreth evolucionit të puplave te shpendët. Duke qenë se pendët e dinozaurëve nuk kanë një bosht qëndror të zhvilluar mirë, i cili quhet ""rachis"", por ndajnë me strukturën e pendëve të sotme karakteristika të tjera, si gjembat dhe barbulat, studiuesit arritën në përfundimin se rachis-i mund të ishte një zhvillim evolucionar më i mëvonshëm se këto tipare. Struktura e pendëve të bën të mendosh se nuk ato përdoreshin në fluturim, por më tepër për të rregulluar temperaturën ose për paraqitjen. Studiuesit janë të mendimit se shembulli tregon një pendë të rrituri, jo një pupël zogu, megjithëse ky është bishti i një dinozauri të vogël. Studiuesit ishin të mendimit se, megjithëse ky është bishti i një dinozauri të vogël, mostra tregon një pendë të rrituri dhe jo një pupël zogu të vogël."
mt: "This confirms not only that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already known, but provides details that are not usually provided by fossils, such as color and three-dimensional presentation. According to scientists, this animal had brownish feathers on the upper part and, on the lower part, feathers with a pale or carotenoid color. This discovery also gives us an idea about the evolution of bird plumage. Since the feathers of dinosaurs do not have a well-developed central shaft, called the "rachis", but share other characteristics with modern feathers, such as quills and barbs, scientists reached the conclusion that the rachis may have been a later evolutionary development than these features. The structure of feathers makes you think they were not used for flight, but more for regulating temperature or display. Scientists believe this is a grown feather, not a baby bird, although this is the tail of a small dinosaur. Scientists believe, although this is the tail of a small dinosaur, this shows a grown feather and not a baby bird."
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Edhe pse një vaksinë eksperimentale mund të ulë vdekshmërinë nga ebola, asnjë bar nuk katreguar qartazi deri më sot efektshmëri në trajtimin e një infeksioni ekzistues. Zmapp, një koktej antitrupash, tregoi në fillim se ishte premtues në këtë fushë, por studimet zyrtare treguan se ishte më pak i dobishëm për parandalimin e vdekjes. ZMapp shërbeu si kontroll i provës PALM, domethënë shkencëtarët e përdorën si referim dhe e krahasuan me tre trajtimet e tjera.
mt: Even though an experimental vaccine may reduce mortality from Ebola, no bar has yet clearly demonstrated efficacy in treating an existing infection. ZMapp, an antitrop cocktail, initially showed promise in this field, but official studies showed it was less effective in preventing death. ZMapp served as the control arm of the PALM trial, meaning scientists used it as a reference and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Shkencëtarët nga Shkolla e Mjekësisë e Universitetit të Stanfordit lajmëruan të hënën për shpikjen e një mjeti të ri diagnostikues, i cili mund t'i klasifikojë qelizat sipas tipit: një çip mjaft i vogël i printueshëm që mund të fabrikohet me anë të printerëve standardë me bojë për ndoshta gati një cent amerikan secili. Studiuesit kryesorë shprehen se kjo ka mundësi të shkaktojë zbulimin e hershëm të kancerit, tuberkulozit, HIV-it e malaries te pacientët në shtetet me të ardhura të pakta, ku nivelet e mbijetesës nga sëmundjet si kanceri i gjirit mund të jenë sa gjysma e atyre të shteteve më të pasura.
mt: Scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced Monday the invention of a new diagnostic tool, which can classify cells by type: a tiny enough chip that can be fabricated using standard inkjet printers for about a penny each. Lead researchers say this has the potential to enable early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV, and malaria in patients in low-income countries, where survival rates from diseases like breast cancer can be half those in wealthier countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Shkencëtarët kanë zbuluar forma toke të shpërndara në sipërfaqen e hënës të quajtura skarpate të prera që me sa duket janë shkaktuar nga tkurrja shumë e ngadaltë e hënës. Këto shembje u zbuluan në gjithë hënën dhe duket se ndikimet e motit kane qenë minimale, gjë që tregon se aktivitetet gjeologjike që i kanë krijuar kanë qenë të kohëve të fundit. Kjo teori kundërshton pretendimin se në hënë nuk ka asnjë aktivitet gjeologjik.
mt: Scientists have discovered a network of cracks on the moon's surface called scarps that appear to have been caused by the moon's very slow cooling. These features were found all over the moon and appear to have been formed recently. This theory contradicts the claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Që atëherë, Adekoja ka qenë e akuzuar se ka vrarë djalin e saj në Gjykatën e shkallës së parë të Edinburgut. Ajo është në paraburgim në pritje të njohjes me akuzën dhe nisjes së gjykimit, por çdo provë e dëshmitarit okular mund të korruptohet për shkak se imazhi i saj është publikuar gjerësisht. Kjo është një praktikë e zakonshme gjetiu në Mbretërinë e Bashkuar, por drejtësia skoceze funksionon në mënyrë të ndryshme dhe gjykatat e kanë konsideruar botimin e fotografive si potencialisht paragjykues për çështjen. Profesorja Pamela Ferguson nga Universiteti i Dundee-it nënvizon se ""duket se gazetarët shkelin në një rrugë të rrezikshme nëse botojnë fotografitë etj. të personave të dyshuar"". Zyra e Prokurorisë, e cila ka nën përgjegjësi të gjitha ndjekjet penale, u ka thënë gazetarëve se nuk do të bëhet asnjë koment i mëtejshëm të paktën deri në shpalljen e aktakuzës."
mt: Adekoja has been charged with murdering her son in the High Court of Edinburgh. She is in custody awaiting indictment and the start of the trial, but any evidence or witness can be corrupted because her image has been widely published. This is a common practice in the United Kingdom, but the Scottish justice system works differently and courts have considered the publication of photographs as potentially prejudicial to the case. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee points out that "it seems that journalists are treading on a dangerous path if they publish photographs etc. of suspects". The Crown Office, which has responsibility for all criminal prosecutions, has said that no further comment will be made at least until the indictment is issued.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Përveç akullit shkatërrimtar, kushtet e vështira të motit i kanë penguar tentativat e shpëtimit. Pitmani këshilloi se nuk do të kishte përmirësim të kushteve deri në një moment javën e ardhshme. Sasia dhe trashësia e akullit lundrues, sipas Pitmanit, është më e keqja që ka ndodhur ndonjëherë për gjuetarët e fokave në 15 vitet e kaluara.
mt: In addition to the destructive ice, the harsh weather conditions have hindered rescue attempts. Pitman advised that there would be no improvement in conditions until a day next week. The size and thickness of the ice floe, according to Pitman, is the worst it has ever been for seal hunters in the past 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Robertsi refuzoi kategorikisht të shprehej mbi fillimin e zanafillës së jetës, një pyetje e rëndësishme për marrjen në konsideratë të etikës së abortit, duke u shprehur se nuk do të ishte etike të komentonte për hollësitë e rasteve të mundshme. Prapëseprapë, ai e përsëriti deklaratën e tij të mëparshme se çështja ""Roi kundër Uejdit"" ishte ""ligji i pandryshueshëm i tokës"", duke e vënë theksin te rëndësia e vendimeve konsekuente të Gjykatës së Lartë. Ai pohoi edhe se besonte në të drejtën e nënkuptuar për privatësi prej së cilës varej vendimi i Roit."
mt: Roberts refused categorically to comment on the beginning of life, a key question for considering the ethics of abortion, saying he would not be ethical to comment on the details of possible cases. Nevertheless, he reiterated his previous statement that the case "Roe v. Wade" was "the unchanging law of the land", emphasizing the importance of the court's consequential decisions. He also stated that he believed in the implied right to privacy on which the Roe decision was based.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Pikërisht në orën 8:46 të mëngjesit heshtja pushtoi qytetin, duke shënuar momentin e saktë kur avioni i parë goditi objektivin e tij. Dy rreze drite ngrihen për të shkuar drejt qiellit gjatë natës. Në vend, po vazhdon ndërtimi i pesë qiellgërvishtësve të rinj të pajisur me një qendër transporti dhe park përkujtimor në mes.
mt: 8:46 am silence fell over the city, marking the exact moment the first plane hit its target. Two beams of light rise towards the sky during the night. Meanwhile, construction continues on five new sky-scrapers equipped with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Të gjitha hyrjet e shpellës të quajtura ""Shtatë motrat"" e kanë diametrin të paktën 100 deri në 250 metra (328 deri në 820 këmbë). Imazhet infra të kuqe tregojnë se luhatjet e temperaturës natën dhe ditën dëshmojnë për një ekzistencë të mundshme të shpellave. Ato janë më të ftohta se sipërfaqja e tyre rrethuese ditën dhe më të ngrohta natën. ""Sjellja e tyre termike nuk është aq e qëndrueshme sa e shpellave të mëdha në Tokë që ruajnë shpesh një temperaturë mjaft konstante, por është në përputhje me faktin që janë vrima të thella në tokë"", - tha Glen Kushingu, anëtar i ekipit të astrogjeologjisë të Qendrës Vëzhguese Gjeologjike të Shteteve të Bashkuara (USGS) dhe i Universitetit të Arizonës së Veriut që ndodhet në Flagstaf të Arizonës."
mt: "All the entrances to the cave called "Seven Sisters" have diameters of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). The infrared images show that temperature fluctuations at night and day indicate a possible existence of caves. They are cooler than their surroundings during the day and warmer at night. "Their thermal behavior is not as stable as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but is consistent with the fact that they are deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing, a member of the USGS Astrogeology Center and the University of Northern Arizona, located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Sipas pretendimeve, burri drejtoi një automjet trirrotësh të armatosur me eksploziv brenda një turme. Burri që dyshohej se shpërtheu bombën u ndalua, pasi u plagos nga shpërthimi. Autoritetet nuk kanë ende informacione për emrin e tij, megjithëse e dinë se është anëtar i grupit etnik ujgur.
mt: According to reports, the man drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was stopped after being injured by the blast. Authorities have not yet released his name, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: "Afrika e Jugut ka mposhtur ""All Blacks"" (Zelandën e Re) në një ndeshje të ""Tri Kombeve"" të unionit të ragbisë në stadiumin ""Royal Bafokeng"" në Rustenburg të Afrikës së Jugut. Rezultati përfundimtar ishte fitore me një pikë, 21 me 20, duke e ndalur vargun e 15 fitoreve rresht të ""All Blacks"". Ajo përmbylli një varg humbjesh prej pesë ndeshjesh për ""Springboks"". Ishte ndeshja e fundit për ekipin All Blacks, të cilët e kishin siguruar tashmë trofeun që para dy javësh. Ndeshja e fundit e serisë do të bëhet javën e ardhshme në ""Ellis Park"" në Johanesburg, kur ""Springboks"" të luajnë me Australinë."
mt: South Africa has beaten the "All Blacks" (New Zealand) in a "Tri Nations" rugby union match at the "Royal Bafokeng" stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point win, 21 to 20, ending the "All Blacks" streak of 15 consecutive wins. It was the "Springboks" fifth loss in a row. The match was the last for the "All Blacks", who had already secured the trophy two weeks ago. The last match of the series will be next week at "Ellis Park" in Johannesburg, where "Springboks" will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stacioni e ruajti qëndrimin e tij deri në fund të udhëtimit në hapësirë, pavarësisht se humbi më parë një xhiroskop gjatë misionit të stacionit hapësinor. Çiao dhe Sharipovi njoftuan se ishin në një largësi të sigurt nga nxitësit e rregullimit të pozicionit. Kontrolli tokësor i Rusisë aktivizoi avionët dhe pozicioni normal i stacionit u rikthye.
mt: The station maintained its position until the end of the space mission, despite losing a gyroscope earlier in the mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were in a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. The Russian ground control activated the spacecraft and the station's normal position was restored.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Çështja ishte objekt procedimi penal në Virxhinia, për shkak se atje ndodhej selia e ofruesit më të rëndësishëm të shërbimit të internetit, AOL, shoqërisë që nxiti akuzat. Kjo është hera e parë që është dhënë një dënim duke zbatuar legjislacionin e miratuar në vitin 2003 për të frenuar shpërndarjen masive të emaileve të paautorizuara apo thënë ndryshe, emaileve të padëshiruara, në llogaritë e postës elektronike të përdoruesve.
mt: The case was being prosecuted in Virginia, where the headquarters of the Internet's most important service provider, AOL, the company that spurred the charges, was located. This is the first time a conviction has been handed down under legislation passed in 2003 to curb the mass distribution of unsolicited or, as it is more commonly known, unsolicited email, in the electronic mail accounts of users.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28-vjeçari Vidal kishte lënë Seviljen për t'u bashkuar me Barçën tri sezone më herët. Që nga shpërngulja në kryeqytetin e Katalojës, Vidali kishte luajtur 49 ndeshje për klubin.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal had left Seville to join Barcelona three seasons earlier. Since the move to the capital of Catalonia, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Në fillim të ditës, Harke po praktikohej gjatë trajnimit parasezonal në Koverçiano të Italisë më herët. Ai po qëndronte në hotelin e skuadrës para një ndeshjeje kundër Bolonjës të planifikuar ditën e dielë. Ai ishte duke qëndruar në hotelin e ekipit para një ndeshje të planifikuar për ditën e diel me Bolonjën.
mt: In the morning, Harke was being practiced during preseason training in Coverciano, Italy, earlier. He was staying in the team hotel before a match against Bologna scheduled for Sunday. He was staying in the team hotel before a match against Bologna scheduled for Sunday.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: Nuk është lëshuar asnjë paralajmërim për cunami dhe, sipas Agjencisë së Gjeofizikës të Xhakartës, nuk do të lëshohet asnjë paralajmërim për cunami, sepse tërmeti nuk plotësoi kërkesën për madhësinë 6,5. Pavarësisht se nuk kishte rrezik për cunami, banorët filloi t'i zërë paniku dhe nisën të linin bizneset dhe shtëpitë e tyre.
mt: No tsunami warning has been issued and, according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency, no tsunami warning will be issued, as the earthquake did not meet the requirement of 6.5 magnitude. Despite there being no risk of a tsunami, residents began to panic and started to close their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Ata zbuluan se funksionimi i Diellit bazohet në të njëjtat parime themelore si yjet e tjera. Përfundimet treguan se aktiviteti në të gjitha yjet e sistemit orientohej nga ndriçimi dhe rrotullimi i tyre dhe asgjë tjetër. Dritësia dhe rrotullimi përdoren bashkë për të përcaktuar numrin e yllit Rossby që ka lidhje me rrjedhën e plazmës. Sa më e vogël vlera e numrit Rossby (Ro), aq më pak aktiv është ylli në përmbysjen e polaritetit të fushës së tij magnetike.
mt: They found that the Sun's behavior is based on the same fundamental principles as other stars. The findings showed that activity on all the stars in the system was driven by illumination and rotation of them and nothing else. Illumination and rotation are used together to determine the star's Rossby number that is related to the flow of plasma. The lower the Rossby number (Ro), the less active the star is in the reversal of its magnetic field.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Në një sondazh me 1400 persona para zgjedhjeve federale të vitit 2010, kundërshtarët e kthimit të Australisë në republikë janë rritur me 8 për qind që nga viti 2008. Kryeministrja në detyrë Julia Gillard deklaroi gjatë fushatës për zgjedhjet federale të vitit 2010 se besonte që shteti i Australisë do të bëhej një republikë në fund të mbretërimit të Mbretëreshës Elizabeta II. 34 për qind e personave në sondazh ndajnë këtë mendim, sipas të cilit ata dëshirojnë që Mbretëresha Elizabeta II të jetë monarkia e fundit e Australisë. Në përgjigjet e skajshme të anketës, 29 për qind e personave të anketuar besojnë se Australia duhet të bëhet sa më shpejt republikë, kurse 31 për qind besojnë se Australia nuk duhet të bëhet kurrë republikë.
mt: In a poll of 1400 people before the 2010 federal election, opponents of the return of Australia to a republic have increased by 8 percent since 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard declared during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed that the state of Australia would become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of people in the poll share this opinion, according to which they want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. In the extreme answers to the survey, 29 percent of people polled believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

Prime Minister Julia Gillard declared during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed that the state of Australia would become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of people in the poll share this opinion, according to which they want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. In the extreme answers to the survey, 29 percent of people polled believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: "Lesli Aun, një zëdhënëse e Fondacionit Komen, u shpreh se organizata miratoi një rregull të ri, i cili ndalon dhënien e ndihmave apo fondeve organizatave nën hetim ligjor. Politika e Komen Foundation e përjashtoi Planned Parenthood për shkak të një hetimi në pritje mbi mënyrën e shpenzimit dhe raportimit të parave nga Planned Parenthood që po kryhet nga anëtari i Dhomës së Përfaqësuesve, Cliff Stearns. Sternsi po heton nëse janë përdorur taksat për financimin e aborteve nëpërmjet ""Planifikimit familjar"" në rolin e tij si kryetar i Nënkomisionit për Mbikëqyrjen dhe Hetimet, i cili është nën ombrellën e Komisionit Parlamentar për Energjinë dhe Tregtinë."
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization approved a new rule that bars giving aid or funds to organizations under legal investigation. The Komen Foundation policy excluded Planned Parenthood because of a pending investigation into the way Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money from Rep. Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether tax dollars were used to fund abortions through "family planning" in his role as chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Policia e Madia Pradeshit rigjeti laptopin dhe telefonin celular të vjedhur. Zëvendësinspektori i përgjithshëm, D K Arya, tha: ""Ne kemi arrestuar pesë personat që kanë përdhunuar shtetasen zvicerane dhe kemi gjetur celularin dhe laptopin e saj"". Të akuzuarit quhen Baba Kanjar, Buta Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar dhe Vishnu Kanjar. Inspektori i policisë Çandra Shekar Solanki tha se të akuzuarit mbërritën në gjykatë me fytyra të mbuluara."
mt: 5 men have been arrested for raping a Swiss woman. Police recovered her laptop and cell phone. The accused are Baba Kanjar, Buta Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police inspector Chandrashekhar Solanki said that the accused came to the court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: "Kompjuteri personal ""ASUS Eee"", i hedhur më herët në treg në të gjithë botën për shkak të faktorëve të kursimit të shpenzimeve dhe të funksionalitetit, u bë një temë e nxehtë në Muajin e TI-së 2007 në Tajpei. Por tregu i konsumatorëve për laptopët do të ndryshojë rrënjësisht dhe do të ketë një larmi më të madhe pasi në vitin 2007, shoqërisë ASUS iu dha Çmimi i qëndrueshmërisë së Tajvanit nga departamenti ekzekutiv i Republikës së Kinës (Tajvan)."
mt: 2007's "ASUS Eee" personal computer, earlier released worldwide due to cost-saving factors and functionality, became a hot topic in Taiwan's 2007 IT Month in Taipei. But the laptop market will change fundamentally and have a wider variety as in 2007, ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Quality Award by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China (Taiwan).
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Problemi filloi më 1 janar, kur dhjetëra banorë vendas filluan të ankoheshin në zyrën postare të Obanazavas se ata nuk i kishin marrë kartolinat e tyre të zakonshme tradicionale për Vitin e Ri. Zyra e postës publikoi dje ndjesën e saj ndaj qytetarëve dhe mediave pasi zbuloi se djali kishte fshehur më shumë se 600 dokumente postare, përfshi 429 kartolina të Vitit të Ri që nuk ishin dërguar te marrësit e tyre të synuar.
mt: 1 January, dozens of local residents began to complain to the Obanazava post office that they had not received their usual traditional New Year's cards. The post office published its apology to citizens and the media yesterday after discovering that the son had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards that had not been delivered to their intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murrej humbi setin e parë në një lojë vendimtare pasi të dy burrat fituan çdo shërbim në set. Del Potro ishte në avantazh në fillim të setit të dytë, por dhe ai kërkoi pushim barazimi pasi arriti 6-6. Potro u mjekua për shpatullën në këtë moment, por arriti të kthehej përsëri në lojë.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a decisive match after both men won every game in the set. Del Potro was ahead at the beginning of the second set, but both men sought a tiebreak after reaching 6-6. Potro was treated for a shoulder injury at this point, but managed to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "I shoqëruar nga ata zyrtarë, ai i siguroi qytetarët e Teksasit se po merreshin masa për mbrojtjen e sigurisë publike. Perri tha konkretisht: ""Pak vende në botë kanë mjete më mira për të përballuar sfidën e paraqitur në këtë rast"". Guvernatori gjithashtu deklaroi: ""Sot mësuam se janë identifikuar disa fëmijë të moshës shkollore që kanë pasur kontakt me pacientin"". Ai tha më pas se ""ky është një rast serioz, por duhet të jeni të sigurt se sistemi ynë po funksionon ashtu si duhet""."
mt: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texans that steps were being taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically stated: ""Few places in the world have better tools to meet the challenge presented in this case."" The governor also declared: ""Today we learned that some school-aged children have had contact with the patient."" He then stated that ""this is a serious case, but you should be assured that our system is working as it should.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: "Shumë para realizimit të The Daily Show dhe të The Colbert Report, Heck dhe Johnson kishin planifikuar një botim që do të bënte parodi me lajmet dhe me raportimin e lajmeve, kur ata ishin studentë në UW në vitin 1988. Që nga themelimi i saj, ""The Onion"" është shndërruar në një perandori të vërtetë të parodive të lajmeve, me një botim për shtyp, një faqe në internet që kishte 5 000 000 vizitorë unikë në muajin tetor, reklama personale, një rrjet lajmesh 24-orësh, podkaste dhe një atlas botëror të prezantuar së fundi të quajtur ""Our Dumb World"". Al Gore dhe gjenerali Tommy Franks herë pas here përmendin titujt e tyre të preferuar (Gore e bëri kur ""The Onion"" shkroi se ai dhe Tipper po shijonin seksin më të mirë të jetës pasi humbi në Kolegjin Zgjedhor në vitin 2000). Shumë prej shkrimtarëve të tyre kanë vazhduar të ushtrojnë ndikim të madh në shfaqjet me parodi lajmesh të Xhon Stjuartit dhe Stefen Kolbertit."
mt: "Before the launch of The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had planned a publication that would parody news and news reporting, when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, ""The Onion"" has become a true empire of news parodies, with a print publication, a website that had 5 million unique visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently released world atlas called ""Our Dumb World"". Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have both been quoted as saying their favorite headlines (Gore did so when ""The Onion"" wrote that he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after losing the Electoral College in 2000). Many of their writers have gone on to have great influence in the news parody shows of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert."
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Protesta filloi rreth orës 11:00 me orën lokale (UTC+1) në Whitehall, para hyrjes së mbrojtur nga policia për në Downing Street, rezidenca zyrtare e kryeministrit. Pak pas orës 11:00, protestuesit bllokuan trafikun në kahun verior në Uajtholl. Në orën 11:20, policia u kërkoi protestuesve të ktheheshin përsëri në trotuar, duke thënë se duhet të ruanin ekuilibrin mes të drejtës për të protestuar dhe krijimit të trafikut. Rreth orës 11:29, protesta u transferua në rrugën Whitehall, duke kapërcyer sheshin Trafalgar, gjatë rrugës Strand, duke kaluar në Aldwych dhe duke u ngjitur në rrugën Kingsway drejt Holborn, ku po zhvillohej Forumi i Pranverës i Partisë Konservatore në hotelin Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC+1) in Whitehall, in front of the protected entrance guarded by police to Downing Street, the official residence of the prime minister. Shortly after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic in the northern loop of Uaytholl. At 11:20, police asked protesters to return to the sidewalk, saying they needed to maintain the balance between the right to protest and the creation of traffic. Around 11:29, the protest was transferred to Whitehall Road, crossing Trafalgar Square, along Strand Road, crossing Aldwych and climbing Kingsway Road to Holborn, where the Conservative Party Spring Forum was being held at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """Ne kemi tani minj 4 muajsh që nuk janë diabetikë, ndërsa më parë ishin diabetikë"", - shtoi ai. Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor i mjekësisë në Dalhousie University në Halifax, Nova Scotia dhe drejtor i departamentit klinik dhe shkencor në Shoqatën Kanadeze të Diabetit, kërkoi të tregohet kujdes, pasi kërkimi është akoma në fillimet e veta. Ashtu sikurse disa ekpertë të tjerë, ai është skeptik ndaj kurueshmërisë së diabetit, duke pasur parasysh se këto rezultate nuk kanë lidhje me personat që kanë tashmë diabet të tipit 1."
mt: 4 months ago we have no diabetics, while before they were diabetics," - he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and director of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, sought to show care, since the search is still in its infancy. As some other experts, he is skeptical of the effectiveness of diabetes, considering that these results have no connection with people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: """Twin Otter"" po bënte dje përpjekje për t'u ulur në Kokoda si fluturimi CG4684 i ""Airlines PNG"", por ai kishte dështuar tashmë një herë. Ai u zhduk pas afërsisht dhjetë minutash nga momenti në të cilin ishte parashikuar të ulej pas avitjes së dytë. Sot u lokalizua vendi i rrëzimit dhe është aq i paarritshëm sa dy policë depërtuan në xhungël nga ajri, për të vazhduar më pas në këmbë deri në vendngjarje ku do të kërkojnë për të mbijetuar. Kërkimi ishte penguar nga i njëjti mot i keq që kishte penguar uljen."
mt: "Twin Otter" was attempting to land at Kokoda yesterday as flight CG4684 of "Airlines PNG", but had already failed once. It disappeared after about ten minutes from the time it was scheduled to land after the second approach. Today the site of the crash was located and it is so inaccessible that two police rappelled from the air, to continue on foot to the site where they will search for survivors. The search was hindered by the same bad weather that had hindered the landing."
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "Fatmirësisht, nuk më ndodhi asgjë, por pashë një skenë të tmerrshme, pasi njerëzit përpiqeshin të thyenin xhamat për të dalë jashtë. Populli po godiste xhamat me karrige, por dritaret nuk thyheshin. ""Më në fund një prej xhamave u thye dhe ata nisën të dilnin nga dritarja"", - tha i mbijetuari Franciszek Koval."
mt: "Fortunately, nothing happened to me, but I saw a terrible scene, as people were trying to break the mosques to get out. The people were hitting the mosques with their hoes, but the windows were not broken. ""Finally, one of the mosques was broken and they started to come out through the window"", - said the survivor Franciszek Koval."
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: "Stuhia tropikale Danielle, stuhia e katërt e përcaktuar e sezonit të uraganeve të Atlantikut për vitin 2010, është krijuar në lindje të Oqeanit Atlantik. Stuhia e lokalizuar afro 3000 milje nga Majami i Floridës ka erëra të vazhdueshme me shpejtësi maksimale prej 40 m/h (64 km/h). Shkencëtarët e Qendrës Kombëtare të Uraganeve parashikojnë që ""Daniele"" do të fuqizohet duke u shndërruar në uragan deri të mërkurën. Duke qenë se stuhia është larg tokës, është akoma e vështirë të vlerësohet ndikimi i mundshëm në Karaibe ose në SHBA."
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the Atlantic Ocean east of Miami, Florida. The storm, located about 3000 miles from Miami, has sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center scientists predict Danielle will strengthen into a hurricane by Monday. Since the storm is far from land, it is too early to assess its potential impact on the Caribbean or the United States.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Li u shpreh po ashtu i shqetësuar për njoftimet se tani fëmijët në Turqi janë infektuar me virusin e gripit të shpendëve A (H5N1) pa pasur shenja të sëmundjes. Sipas disa studimeve, sugjerohet se sëmundja do të jetë më pak vdekjeprurëse përpara se të mund të shkaktojë një epidemi globale, - tha ai. Ekziston shqetësimi që pacientët mund të vijojnë të infektojnë persona të tjerë duke vazhduar rutinën e tyre të zakonshme nëse simptomat e gripit vijojnë të jenë të lehta.
mt: Dr. Li expressed similar concern over reports that children in Turkey are now infected with the avian influenza A (H5N1) virus without showing symptoms. According to some studies, it is suggested that the disease will be less deadly before it can cause a global epidemic, he said. There is concern that patients may continue to infect others by following their routine if the symptoms of the flu continue to be mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Në natën e datës 9 gusht, qendra e tajfunit Morakot ishte rreth shtatëdhjetë kilometra larg nga provinca kineze Fuxhian. Vlerësohet se tajfuni lëviz drejt Kinës me njëmbëdhjetë km/orë.
mt: 9 August, the center of typhoon Morakot was about seventy kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian. It is estimated that the typhoon moves towards China at eleven km/hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Presidenti i SHBA-së Xhorxh U. Bush mbërriti në Singapor mëngjesin e 16 nëntorit, duke nisur një turne njëjavore në Azi. Ai u mirëprit nga zëvendëskryeministri i Singaporit Uong Kan Seng dhe diskutoi çështje të tregtisë dhe terrorizmit me kryeministrin e Singaporit Li Hsien Long. Pas një jave humbjesh në zgjedhjet në mes të mandatit, Bushi foli në një pritje zyrtare për zgjerimin e tregtisë në Azi.
mt: 16 November 2006, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning, beginning a one-week tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a mid-term election hiatus, Bush spoke at a formal welcome for the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Njoftimi i sotëm përforcoi po ashtu angazhimin e qeverisë e marrë në mars të këtij viti për financimin e vagonëve shtesë. Me 300 vagonë shtesë, totali arrin në 1300 vagonë që do të blihen për të ulur ngarkesën në transport.
mt: The latest announcement also reinforced the government's commitment made in March of this year to finance additional wagons. With 300 additional wagons, the total reaches 1300 wagons that will be purchased to reduce the load in transport.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Ajo u shpreh: ""Nuk ka asnjë informatë që të bën të mendosh se pritet një sulm së shpejti. Megjithatë, ulja e nivelit të rrezikut në ""i madh"" nuk do të thotë se rreziku i përgjithshëm është larguar""."
mt: "She said: ""There is no information to make you think an attack is imminent. However, lowering the threat level from ""high"" does not mean the overall risk has been removed.""
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Dje, Martelly u betua para një Këshilli të ri Zgjedhor të Përkohshëm (CEP) prej nëntë anëtarësh. Ky është Këshilli Zgjedhor i Përkohshëm i pestë për Martelin në katër vjet. Muajin e kaluar, një komision presidencial rekomandoi dorëheqjen e Këshillit të Përkohshëm Zgjedhor të mëparshëm si pjesë të një pakete masash për ta çuar vendin drejt zgjedhjeve të reja. Komisioni ishte përgjigja e Martelly-it për protestat e zgjeruara kundër regjimit që filluan në tetor. Protestat, ndonjëherë të dhunshme, u shkaktuan nga moszhvillimi i zgjedhjeve, disa prej të cilave priten që prej vitit 2011.
mt: Yesterday, Martelly swore in a new nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP). This is Martelly's fourth Provisional Electoral Council in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended the resignation of the previous Provisional Electoral Council as part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to the widening protests against his government that began in October. The protests, sometimes violent, were sparked by the failure to hold elections, some of which have been delayed since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: "Ekipi i gjimnastikës i Shteteve të Bashkuara e mbështet letrën e Komitetit Olimpik të Shteteve të Bashkuara dhe pranon nevojën e padiskutueshme të familjes olimpike për promovimin e një ambienti të sigurt për të gjithë atletët tanë. Ne pajtohemi me deklaratën e Komitetit Olimpik dhe Paraolimpik të Shteteve të Bashkuara se interesat e atletëve dhe klubeve tona, si dhe të sportit të tyre, mund të shprehen më mirë nëpërmjet zbatimit të një ndryshimi kuptimplotë brenda organizatës sonë sesa nëpërmjet heqjes së certifikatave. USA Gymnastics mbështet një hetim të pavarur që mund të hedhë dritë mbi mënyrën sesi një abuzim i përmasave të përshkruara me aq guxim nga viktimat e Larry Nassar mund të qëndronte i pazbuluar për kaq kohë dhe përkrah çdo ndryshim të nevojshëm dhe të duhur. ""USA Gymnastics"" dhe Komiteti Olimpik dhe Paraolimpik i SHBA-ve ndajnë të njëjtin qëllim - ta bëjnë sportin e gjimnastikës dhe disiplina të tjera, sa më të sigurta në mënyrë që atletët të ndjekin ëndrrat e tyre në një mjedis të sigurt, pozitiv dhe motivues."
mt: "The United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee and USA Gymnastics have agreed to a full and complete arbitration of the issues raised in the lawsuit filed by the USOPC on July 26, 2018. The USOPC and USA Gymnastics have agreed to a full and complete arbitration of the issues raised in the lawsuit filed by the USOPC on July 26, 2018. The USOPC and USA Gymnastics have agreed to a full and complete arbitration of the issues raised in the lawsuit filed by the USOPC on July 26, 201
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "Flota ushtarake e Shteteve të Bashkuara deklaroi po ashtu se po e hetonte incidentin. Gjithashu, ata u shprehën në një deklaratë: ""Ekuipazhi po punon tani për tani për të vendosur mënyrën më të mirë për ta nxjerrë anijen pa pësuar gjë"". Si një anije minapastruese e klasit Avenger, ajo ishte rrugës për në Puerto Princesa në Palavan. Ajo i është caktuar Flotës së Shtatë të Marinës Amerikane dhe e ka bazën në Sasebo të Nagasakit në Japoni."
mt: The U.S. Navy declared it was also investigating the incident. They also stated in a statement: "The crew is currently working to determine the best way to get the ship out without damage." As a minescraper of the Avenger class, it was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Marines and has its base in Sasebo in Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

Gjithashu, ata u shprehën në një deklaratë: ""Ekuipazhi po punon tani për tani për të vendosur mënyrën më të mirë për ta nxjerrë anijen pa pësuar gjë"". Si një anije minapastruese e klasit Avenger, ajo ishte rrugës për në Puerto Princesa në Palavan. Ajo i është caktuar Flotës së Shtatë të Marinës Amerikane dhe e ka bazën në Sasebo të Nagasakit në Japoni."
mt: The U.S. Navy declared it was also investigating the incident. They also stated in a statement: "The crew is currently working to determine the best way to get the ship out without damage." As a minescraper of the Avenger class, it was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Marines and has its base in Sasebo in Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Në orët e vona të ditës së diel, Presidenti i Shteteve të Bashkuara Donald Trump, në një deklaratë të shpërndarë nëpërmjet sekretarit për shtypin, njoftoi se trupat amerikane do të largohen nga Siria. Njoftimi u bë pas një bisede telefonike që pati Trampi me presidentin turk, Rexhep Tajip Erdogan. Gjithashtu, Turqia do të marrë përsipër të ruajë luftëtarët e kapur të Shtetit Islamik të Irakut dhe Sirisë, të cilët shtetet evropiane nuk kanë pranuar t'i riatdhesojnë, -sipas deklaratës.
mt: In the late hours of Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement released through the press secretary, announced that American troops will be withdrawn from Syria. The announcement came after a phone call that Trump had with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Also, Turkey will take over the responsibility of holding the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria fighters, who European states have refused to repatriate, -according to the statement.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalicioni dhe trupat afgane hynë në rajon për të siguruar vendin dhe u asistuan nga forca të tjera ajrore të koalicionit. Rrëzimi ngjau lart në një terren malor dhe mendohet të jetë shkaktuar nga një zjarr armiqësor. Përpjekjet për kërkime në vendin e përplasjes po hasin në mot të keq dhe terren të ashpër.
mt: Coalition and Afghan forces entered the area to secure the site and were assisted by other coalition air forces. The crash site was high up in mountainous terrain and is believed to have been caused by enemy fire. Efforts to search the crash site are being hampered by bad weather and rough terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Pas ndërtimit të digës në vitin 1963, ndaluan përmbytjet stinore që shpërndanin sedimentin gjatë gjithë lumit. Këto sedimente janë të nevojshme për krijimin e cekëtinave ranore dhe plazheve, të cilat shërbejnë si habitate të faunës së egër. Si pasojë, dy lloje peshqish janë zhdukur dhe dy të tjera janë të rrezikuara, përfshi edhe peshkun topolak me gunga. Ndonëse niveli i ujit do të ngrihet vetëm disa këmbë pas përmbytjes, zyrtarët kanë shpresë se do të mjaftojë për të restauruar brigjet ranore të gërryera në rrjedhën e poshtme.
mt: After the construction of the dam in 1963, seasonal floods that spread sediment throughout the river were halted. These sediments are necessary for the creation of sandy beaches and dunes, which serve as habitats for wildlife. As a result, two fish species have been extirpated and two others are endangered, including the sturgeon. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flooding, officials hope it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars in the lower reaches.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Ambasada e SHBA-së që ndodhet në Najrobi në Kenia ka paralajmëruar se ""ekstremistë nga Somalia"" janë duke planifikuar të nisin sulme kamikaz me bomba vetëvrasëse në Kenia dhe Etiopi. Shtetet e Bashkuara thonë se kanë marrë informacione prej një burimi të pazbuluar, i cili përmend konkretisht përdorimin e bombarduesve vetëvrasës për hedhjen në erë të ""monumenteve të rëndësishme"" në Etiopi e Kenia."
mt: The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has warned that "Somali extremists" are planning suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States say they have received information from an undisclosed source, which specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to launch "important monuments" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Avokatët e njohur grekë, Sakis Kehajoglu dhe Jorgo Nikolakopulos, janë burgosur në burgun e Koridhalos në Athinë pasi u shpallën fajtorë për marrje ryshfeti dhe korrupsion. Si pasojë, është shkaktuar një skandal i madh brenda komunitetit juridik grek nëpërmjet ekspozimit të veprimeve të paligjshme të bëra gjatë viteve të mëparshme nga gjyqtarët, juristët, avokatët dhe prokurorët. Disa javë më parë, pas publikimit të informacionit nga gazetari Makis Triantafilopulos në emisionin e tij televiziv shumë të ndjekur ""Zoungla"" në televizionin ""Alpha"", parlamentari dhe avokati Petro Mantuvalos dha dorëheqjen, pasi anëtarë të zyrës së tij ishin përfshirë në marrje të paligjshme ryshfeti dhe korrupsion. Gjithashtu, gjyqtari i lartë Evangelos Kalusis është burgosur pasi u shpall fajtor për korrupsion dhe për sjellje të pahijshme."
mt: 2 well-known Greek lawyers, Sakis Kehajoglu and Jorgo Nikolakopulos, were arrested in the Koridhalos prison in Athens after being found guilty of bribery and corruption. As a result, a major scandal has erupted within the Greek legal community through the exposure of illegal actions carried out over the past years by judges, lawyers, and prosecutors. Several weeks ago, after the publication of information by journalist Makis Triantafilopulos in his very popular television show "Zoungla" on the Alpha television channel, parliamentarian and lawyer Petro Mantuvalos resigned, after members of his office were involved in illegal bribery and corruption. Also, high court judge Evangelos Kalusis was arrested after being found guilty of corruption and improper behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Utapa arriti rezultatin më të lartë në shërbime, 70 vrapime për vetëm 41 topa, duke goditur 11 katërshe dhe 2 gjashtëshe. Gjuajtësit e pozicionit të mesit, Sachin Tendulkar dhe Rahul Dravid, u paraqitën mirë dhe realizuan njëqind vrapime së bashku. Por, pasi humbi portën e kapitenit, India kreu vetëm 36 vrapime, duke humbur 7 porta deri në përfundim të shërbimeve.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest in the services, 70 runs for just 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle-order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, looked good and scored a century together. But, after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs, losing 7 wickets till the end of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Administratori i ""Commons"", Adam Kuerden, shprehu irritimin e tij për fshirjet kur foli për Wikinews muajin e shkuar. ""Ai [Uellsi] na gënjeu në fakt që në fillim. Së pari, duke luajtur rolin sikur kjo po bëhej për arsye ligjore. Më pas, duke u shtirur sikur po na dëgjonte, deri sa e fshiu artin e tij."" Acarimi i komunitetit çoi në përpjekjet e tanishme për hartimin e një politike lidhur me përmbajtjen seksuale për faqen që përmban miliona media me licenca të hapura."
mt: "Commons administrator Adam Kuerden expressed his irritation over the deletions last month.  'He [Wells] lied to us from the start.  First, playing the role as if this was being done for legal reasons.  Then, cajoling us as if he was listening, until he deleted his own work.'  The community backlash led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site that hosts millions of open-licensed media."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Përfshirjen e kategorive të grave nuk e përkrahën të gjithë. Fituesi i medaljes së argjendtë në Lojërat Olimpike të vitit 2004, Amir Khan, tha: ""Thellë-thellë mendoj se gratë nuk duhet të luftojnë. Këtë mendim kam"". Pavarësisht nga komentet e tij, ai tha se do t'i përkrahë konkurrentët britanikë në Lojërat Olimpike 2012 që do të zhvillohen në Londër."
mt: "The inclusion of women is not supported by all. The silver medalist at the 2004 Olympic Games, Amir Khan, said: "Deeply I think women should not fight. This opinion I have." Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympic Games to be held in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, një pilot motoçiklete 13-vjeçar, ka vdekur pas përfshirjes në një përplasje në Pistën e Motoçiklizmit të Indianapolisit. Ndërsa ishte në xhiron e tij të nxehjes, Lenzi ra nga motoçikleta e tij dhe më pas u godit nga bashkëgaruesi Ksavier Zajati. Ai u trajtua menjëherë nga personeli mjekësor gjatë rrugës dhe u transportua në një spital vendës ku vdiq më pas. Zayat nuk u dëmtua në këtë aksident.
mt: 13-year-old Peter Lenz, a motorcycle pilot, has died after being involved in a crash on the Indianapolis Motor Speedway's track. While in his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his motorcycle and was then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by medical personnel on the scene and was transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in this accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Fluturimi me aeroplan mund të jetë një eksperiencë e frikshme për njerëzit e çdo moshe dhe origjine, sidomos nëse nuk kanë fluturuar më parë ose kanë kaluar ndonjë ngjarje traumatike. Nuk është diçka për të pasur turp: nuk është ndryshe nga frikat personale dhe mospëlqimet e gjërave të tjera që kanë shumë e shumë njerëz. Për disa, njëfarë njohurie se si punon avioni dhe çfarë ndodh në një fluturim, mund t'i ndihmojë ta mposhtin frikën që bazohet tek e panjohura ose tek mospasja e gjërave nën kontroll.
mt: Flying can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they have never flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It's nothing to be ashamed of: it's no different from personal fears and dislikes of other things that many people have. For some, a little knowledge of how the plane works and what happens in a flight, can help them overcome the fear based on the unknown or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Në ditët e sotme, fluturimet shumë rrallë rezervohen drejtpërdrejt nga shoqëria ajrore pa kërkuar më parë për to dhe pa krahasuar çmimet. I njëjti fluturim mund të ketë ndonjëherë çmime jashtëzakonisht të ndryshme në agregatorë të ndryshëm dhe është me leverdi që, para se të rezervosh, të krahasosh rezultatet e kërkimit dhe të shikosh edhe në uebsajtin e vetë linjës ajrore.
mt: Today, many flights are rarely booked directly from the airline without first searching for them and comparing prices. The same flight may have wildly different prices on different aggregators and it is worthwhile, before booking, to search the airline's website as well.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Shoqëritë korriere paguhen mirë për t'i dorëzuar gjërat shpejt. Koha është shpesh shumë e rëndësishme për dokumentet e punës, mallrat apo pjesët e këmbimit për një riparim urgjent. Për disa linja, shoqëritë më të mëdha kanë avionët e tyre, por ishte problem për linjat e tjera dhe shoqëritë më të vogla. Nëse do t'i dërgonin gjërat me transport ajror, për disa itinerare mund të duheshin ditë të tëra për të kaluar procesin e shkarkimit dhe zhdoganimit. Mënyra e vetme për t’i kaluar më shpejt do të ishte dërgesa si bagazh i regjistruar. Rregulloret e linjave ajrore nuk e lejojnë dërgimin e bagazheve pa pasagjerë, dhe këtu është roli juaj.
mt: Courier companies charge well for quick delivery. Time is often very important for work documents, goods or parts for an urgent repair. For some lines, the larger companies have their own planes, but it was a problem for other lines and smaller companies. If they sent the goods by air, for some itineraries it would take days to pass the loading and unloading process. The only way to do it faster would be to send it as registered baggage. Airline regulations do not allow the delivery of baggage without passengers, and here is your role.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: "Duhet ta zgjidhni me kujdes linjën tuaj ajrore të një aleance për programin ""Pasagjerët e shpeshtë"" Megjithëse mund të mendoni se është e natyrshme të bashkoheni me linjën ajrore me të cilën fluturoni më shpesh, duhet të keni parasysh se privilegjet e ofruara janë shpesh të ndryshme dhe pikët për fluturimet mund të jenë më të shumta nga një linjë tjetër ajrore nga e njëjta aleancë."
mt: "You should carefully consider your airline alliance for the "Frequent Flyers" program. Although you may think it is natural to join the airline you fly most often, you should consider that the privileges offered are often different and the points for flights may be more from another airline in the same alliance."
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Pini pije alkoolike me masë. Alkooli ka efekte të ndryshme te çdonjëri dhe ka shumë rëndësi të dini kufirin tuaj. Problemet e mundshme të shëndetit në aspektin afatgjatë nga të pirët e tepërt mund të përfshijnë dëmtimin e mëlçisë, madje edhe verbërinë e vdekjen. Rreziku i mundshëm rritet kur konsumohet alkool i prodhuar në mënyrë të jashtëligjshme. Pijet alkoolike të paligjshme mund të përmbajnë gjithfarë papastërtish të rrezikshme, përfshi metanolin, i cili edhe në doza të vogla mund të shkaktojë verbim apo vdekje.
mt: Alcohol is a depressant. Alcohol affects each person differently and it is important to know your limits. Possible long-term health problems from excessive drinking can include liver damage, even blindness and death. The risk increases when drinking illegally produced alcohol. Illegally produced alcohol can contain any number of dangerous contaminants, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Distrikti i Kanalit (Grachtengordel në gjuhën holandeze) është distrikti i famshëm i shekullit të 17-të që rrethon lagjen Binnenstad në Amsterdam. Gjithë rajoni është përcaktuar si Vend i Trashëgimisë Botërore të UNESCO-s për vlerën e tij shumë të rrallë kulturore e historike dhe vlerat e pronave të tij janë midis më të lartave në vend.
mt: The Canal District (Grachtengordel in Dutch) is the famous 17th-century district that surrounds the Binnenstad area in Amsterdam. The entire area has been designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its rare cultural and historical value and the values of its holdings are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, rreth 12 kilometra në jugperëndim të Siem Reap. Ky tempull, i cili ndodhet në majë të malit, është ndërtuar në fundin e shekullit të 9-të gjatë sundimit të mbretit Yasovarman. Atmosfera e zymtë e këtij tempulli dhe panorama mbi liqenin Tonle Sap bëjnë që kjo ngjitje në kodër t'ia vlejë. Vizitën në vend mund ta kombinoni me lehtësi me një ekskursion me varkë në liqen. Për të hyrë në tempull, nevojitet karta Angkor Pass, prandaj mos harroni që të merrni me vete pasaportën kur të shkoni në Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This temple, built on a hilltop at the end of the 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman, is a must-see. The atmosphere of this temple and the panorama over Tonle Sap lake make this climb worthwhile. You can combine this visit with a boat excursion on the lake. To enter the temple, you need the Angkor Pass, so don't forget to bring your passport when you go to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktida është vendi më i ftohtë në Tokë dhe rrethon Polin e Jugut. Vizitat turistike janë të shtrenjta, kërkojnë formë të mirë fizike, mund të zhvillohen vetëm në verë, nëntor-shkurt dhe janë kryesisht të kufizuara në gadishull, ishuj dhe detin Ros. Dy mijë anëtarë personeli banojnë këtu në verë, në afërsisht katër duzina bazash përgjithësisht në ato zona; një numër i vogël rrinë gjatë dimrit. Pjesa e brendshme e Antarktidës është një pllajë e shkretuar dhe e mbuluar me 2-3 km akull. Vizitat e herëpashershme turistike të specializuara nga ajri shkojnë në brendësi, për alpinizëm ose për të mbërritur në Pol, ku ndodhet një bazë e madhe.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, require good physical condition, can only be made in summer, November-February and are mostly limited to the mainland, islands and the Ross Sea. Two thousand personnel live here in summer, at about four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay in winter. The interior of Antartica is a barren plateau and covered with 2-3 km ice. Tourist visits by air go in, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, where a large base is located.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Observatorët e epokës së mesjetës, në ditët e sotme kanë dalë thuajse jashtë funksioni dhe përdoren si muze apo vende edukimi. Duke qenë se ndotja nga dritat në ditët e tyre nuk ishte aq problem sa është sot, ato ndodhen zakonisht në qytete ose në kampuse, ku mund të shkohet më lehtë se në ato që janë ndërtuar në kohërat moderne. Pjesa më e madhe e teleskopëve studimorë modernë janë objekte shumë të mëdha në zona të veçuara me kushte të favorshme atmosferike.
mt: Observatories of the Middle Ages, in today's days have come out of function almost and are used as museums or educational sites. Being that the pollution from the lights in their days was not as much of a problem as it is now, they are usually located in cities or campuses, where it is easier to go than in those that are built in modern times. Most modern scientific telescopes are very large objects in isolated areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
